When Quick Attack mode ends, the realm explodes to deal Dark DMG and empty No. 21: XXI's Energy, Blue Orbs and buffs. Creating Twilight Matrices during the Signature Move will increase the explosion's Extra DMG Bonus.
Co-Bot: It will not perform other skills while the Signature Move is being cast. When Quick Attack mode ends, it releases a Force Wave to detonate all Twilight Matrices.

- When there are 6 Twilight Matrices, the Signature Move will achieve an S Rank, increasing the explosion DMG by **{2}%**.

skills.name: Core Passive
description: The Basic Attack combo DMG ratio is adjusted. Gains  Deception Points based on the combo type upon triggering  valid combos. Roland's Red / Yellow / Blue Orbs are unlocked when there are a certain amount of  Deception Points. Each time the 1st or 2nd hit of a Signal Orb skill is cast,  Deception Points will be consumed to generate Energy. The combos of Basic Attacks and Signal Orb skills can be viewed in the description of each skill.  Valid combos: The Basic Attack combo launched within 1s after dealing DMG from Basic Attacks. Upon triggering Matrix, the next Signal Orb skill cast does not consume any  Deception Points or  Trickery Points. Roland cannot gain Signal Orbs from Basic Attacks. When he is switched off battle, he gains  Deception Points. Signal Orbs gained from any other source would be directly converted into  Deception Points or Energy, prioritizing  Deception Points.
result: - The Basic Attack combo DMG ratio changes to **{0}%**.
- Gains 10 / 20 / 30 Deception Points (up to 90) based on the combo type.
- Red / Yellow / Blue Orbs are unlocked when there are at least 30 Deception Points.
- Each time the 1st or 2nd hit of a Signal Orb skill is cast, 30 Deception Points will be consumed to generate 10 Energy.
- Upon triggering Matrix, the next Signal Orb skill cast within 10s does not consume any Deception Points or Trickery Points.
- Gains 60 Deception Points when switched off battle.
- Signal Orbs gained from any other source would be directly converted into 10 Deception Points or 5 Energy.

Each time orbs are pinged, triggers  Prayer Ripple that deals Fire DMG to enemies, imprisons them, and heals allies. levels.desc:
After casting Gigabyte Star Strike, switch Nanami: Starfarer out of battle to trigger Missile Support, dealing Fire DMG. "Oops! Missed it!" / "Perfect"/Burning Blow will come with the **Scorching Invasion** effect that reduces the enemy's Fire Resistance. Casting Burning Blow will trigger the QTEs that are not in cooldown yet.
- Missile Support fires 4 missiles every 3s for 12s, dealing 800% Fire DMG in total.
- **Scorching Invasion** reduces the enemy's Fire Resistance by 15% for 8s.

Nanami: Starfarer's **Scorching Invasion** effect increases. The Extra DMG Bonuses of Burning Blow and Signature - Ace Star increase. When Nanami is in the  "Bzzz" Mode, press and hold until the charge limit to automatically trigger "Perfect!". When Nanami is in the Slide Mode or the "Bzzz" Mode, she restores Shield.
- **Scorching Invasion**'s effect increases by 10%.
- The Extra DMG Bonus of Burning Blow increases by 25%.
- The Extra DMG Bonus of Signature - Ace Star increases by 25%.
- When Nanami is in the Slide Mode or the "Bzzz" Mode, she restores shield equal to 10% of max HP per second, up to 50%.

The damage recorded by Soul of Molten Steel increases. Max Pressure increases. The "Rumbling" Mode grants pressure every second. "Oops! Missed it!" /  "Perfect!" grants bonus Pressure.
- The damage recorded by Soul of Molten Steel increases to 100%.
- Max Pressure increases to 999.
- The "Rumbling" Mode grants 50 Pressure every second. "Oops! Missed it!" grants 80 more Pressure.

skills.name: Leap Attack

description: When Karenina: Scire has at least a set of 3-Ping Orbs among up to 8 Signal Orbs, holding the Basic Attack button will start charging and consume 3-Ping Orbs (up to 2 sets can be consumed), each set granting Anti-gravity Energy. While charging, Karenina cannot dodge but gains Super Armor and Extra DMG Reduction. After that, Karenina leaps up into the air with  Leap Attack that deals Dark DMG (its Base DMG increases if 2 sets of 3-Ping Orbs have been consumed) and activates the Anti-gravity status. When Karenina enters Matrix, holding the Basic Attack button will start charging and automatically consume Matrix's orb pinging effect (which is considered to consume a set of 3-Ping Orbs).

levels.desc: Karenina: Scire gains an Anti-gravity Shield equal to  10% of max HP for every set of 3-Ping Orbs consumed when charging.

Upon dealing damage, inflicts a  **Chain Fusion** effect that reduces the target's Dark Resistance by  15% for  3s. When Karenina: Scire starts charging, the Signal Orbs will be rearranged in the order of red, blue, and yellow.

Gains an extra 3-Ping chance triggered by pressing and holding Basic Attack to charge (up to three times). Upon the third 3-Ping, the corresponding Leap Attack will deal  400% more Base DMG, and Radiant Whirlwind will deal  75% more Base DMG. Upon casting  Starshatter Horizon, Karenina: Scire will generate a  15s  Thermal Field, dealing  75% Dark DMG once to targets entering the field and inflicting them with  **Chain Fusion** that reduces Dark Resistance by  15% for  10s.

When in the Anti-gravity status, Karenina: Scire deals  10% more Dark DMG. Dealing damage will reduce the target's Extra DMG Reduction by  5% for  8s. Triggering this effect again will renew its duration. Press and hold Basic Attack to start charging and immediately activate QTEs that are not in cooldown.  Radiant Whirlwind's spin speed will automatically increase.

When a teammate casts their Signature Move, it will provide a set of 3-Ping Orbs to Karenina: Scire who is on standby. (Each teammate can only trigger this once after entering the field.) Karenina gains an extra 3-Ping chance triggered by pressing and holding Basic Attack to charge (up to four times). Upon the fourth 3-Ping, the Base DMG of  Leap Attack increases by  600% and the Base DMG of  Radiant Whirlwind increases by  200%.
Radiant Whirlwind gains  30% Extra DMG Bonus.
Starshatter Horizon gains  40% Extra DMG Bonus. Karenina: Scire will gain 3 Signal Orbs of a random color every time being switched in.

description: Base DMG of Signal Orbs increases by 50%.

[Core Passive-Space Walk] added effect: Affix: Electroconvergence
- Effect Resource: Maximum points of Ampere Accumulation: 1000.

- When the Effect is triggered: Character with the Electroconvergence Effect enters the Electronic Blast state and causes lightning to fall around themselves, dealing 800% Electroconvergence DMG every 2s for 12s (this cannot trigger the Tank Class passive).

When Vibrant Brushstroke deals DMG, spends 1 "Backup Paint" to gain 1 set of 3-Ping Orbs in the same color as the "Backup Paint".
result: - All allies within the area restore HP equal to 20% of her ATK.

skills.name: Art Influence
description: Healed allies gain **Frost Crystal**l, which increases Ice DMG by **{0}%** for 8s. The duration resets every time it is triggered.

skills.name: Color Rendering

Signal Orbs will rearrange based on 3-Ping rules. Time Lag Calculation will be triggered when performing this Signature Move.
result: - Deals **{0}%** Ice DMG.
- All Energy is converted into Coolant when Painter's Realm is expanded. Pinging Signal Orbs or performing Basic Attacks does not recover Signature Energy.

skills.name: Finishing Touch
description: Rides the Beam Gunlance into the air and throws the Beam Gunlance, dealing Ice DMG and leaving behind an Improvisation that lasts for 5s. Time Lag Calculation will be triggered when performing this Signature Move.
result: - Deals **{0}%** Ice DMG.
- Improvisation restores HP equal to 30% of Ayla's ATK to all allies within range every second.

qte.name: Prismatic Ribbon
qte.description: Ayla paints around the target with beautiful colors, dealing Ice DMG and restoring HP for teammates on the field.
result: - Deals **{0}%** Ice DMG and heals for HP equal to **{1}%** of her ATK.

leader.name: Source of Inspiration
leader.description: All team members' ATK increases by 10% and all Amplifiers' Ice DMG increases by 5%.

class.name: Amplifier
class.description: All switched-in members gain an extra **{0}%** ATK and **{1}%** Elemental DMG Bonus of the Amplifier's element for 10s.

Increases Extra DMG Bonus by 20% when the Signature - Painter's Realm is expanded. Gains 30 Signature Energy and 1 "Backup Paint" every time upon entering the battlefied.

Gains the extra buffs of Pure Color: Theme Emphasis and Color Mix: Clash of Concepts when casting either skill. Ice DMG Bonus of 3-Pings, Pure Color: Theme Emphasis, and Color Mix: Clash of Concepts increases by 10%.
Increases the effects of Amplifier Class Skill by 100%. Increases the extra buffs of Pure Color: Theme Emphasis and Color Mix: Clash of Concepts to 15%.
Extra DMG Bonus of Vibrant Brushstroke increases by 20%.
Extra DMG Bonus of 3-Pings, Pure Color: Theme Emphasis, and Color Mix: Clash of Concepts increases by 50%.
Extra DMG Bonus of Signature - Finishing Touch increases by 50%.

result: - Deals **{0}%** Lightning DMG in total.

result: - Deals **{0}%** Lightning DMG in total.

result: - When Alpha holds the kodachi, each swordwave deals **{0}%** Lightning DMG.
- When Alpha holds the odachi, each swordwave deals **{1}%** Lightning DMG.

When casting Unquenchable Flare, Alpha becomes invincible but is unable to cast Signature - Weave: Karmic Inferno.
result: - Leaping Thrust deals **{0}%** Lightning DMG.
- Thunderous Bash deals **{1}%** Lightning DMG in total.

skills.name: Formless Confrontation
description: When wielding the kodachi, Alpha can only use Blue Orb skills. Her Basic Attacks will only grant Blue Orbs, which will be arranged in front of her other orbs by default. When wielding the odachi, Alpha can only use Red or Yellow Orb Skills. Her Basic Attacks will only grant Red or Yellow Orbs, and Blue Orbs will be randomly converted into Red or Yellow Orbs.

skills.name: Sundered Delusion
skills.button_press: Press and hold Dodge to enter Foresight Charge
description: Press and hold Dodge to enter Foresight Charge, gaining Blade Aura over time. During this time, Lucia: Crimson Weave gets Super Armor and 30% DMG Reduction, is unable to restore the Dodge Gauge, and enters the Parry Stance. Pinging Signal Orbs can also increase Blade Aura.
result: - Restores 4 Blade Aura every 0.1s in Foresight Charge Mode.
- Gains 10 / 20 / 40 Blade Aura based on the number of the orbs pinged.
- Blade Aura limit: 120.
- When taking DMG in the Parry Stance, increases DMG Reduction to 70%. Can parry up to 3 times.

skills.name: Resolute Blow
description: Press and hold Dodge to enter Foresight Charge. Afterward, release Dodge at 0 / 60 / 120 Blade Aura to perform a powerful slash and deal Lightning DMG, during which Alpha gains Super Armor and 50% DMG Reduction and is unable to restore the Dodge Gauge.
result: - When holding the kodachi, Alpha deals **{0}%** / **{1}%** / **{2}%** Lightning DMG.
- When holding the odachi, Alpha deals **{3}%** / **{4}%** / **{5}%** Lightning DMG.
- Performing a powerful slash when Blade Aura is full will make Alpha invincible, clear Blade Aura, activate Selfless Stance and restore 25 Signature Energy.
- Alpha will automatically perform a powerful slash 1.5s after Blade Aura reaches the upper limit.

skills.name: Aphotic Points
skills.button_press: Gained automatically when casting Signal Orb Skills/Blading Radiance/Resolute Blow
description: Gains Aphotic Points every time when casting a Signal Orb Skill, Blading Radiance, or Resolute Blow. Casting Unquenchable Flare will consume all Aphotic Points to increase the Base DMG of Unquenchable Flare's Thunderous Bash based on the Aphotic Points consumed.
result: - Aphotic Points limit: 300. Each Aphotic Point increases the Base DMG of Unquenchable Flare's Thunderous Bash by 1%.
- Casting Resolute Blow at full Blade Aura will grant 40 Aphotic Points.
- Gains 10/20/40 Aphotic Points based on the number of orbs pinged.
- When unleashing swordwaves through Blading Radiance, restores 20 Aphotic Points every 0.5s.

skills.name: Weave: Splashing Thunder
description: Slowly pulls the odachi and summons thunder to deal Lightning DMG to nearby targets in a large area, then holds the odachi in hand. Triggers Time Lag Calculation when casting the skill.
result: - Deals **{0}%** Lightning DMG in total.

skills.name: Weave: Karmic Inferno
description: When Alpha is holding the odachi, tap Signature to consume Signature Energy and deal Lightning DMG in a large area. Alpha then puts the odachi away and holds the kodachi in hand. Triggers Time Lag Calculation when casting the skill.
result: - Deals a total of **{0}%** Lightning DMG.

qte.name: Flashes of Steel
qte.description: Slashes multiple times to deal **{0}%** Lightning DMG.

leader.description: Increases Lightning DMG of all members by 10%. Increases ATK of all Attacker Omniframes in the team by 10%.

class.name: Attacker
class.description: Extra DMG Bonus increases by **{0}%**.

levels.desc: Casting Resolute Blow at full Blade Aura will also activate all available QTEs.
Aphotic Point limit increases to 600. 3-Ping Skills and Resolute Blow gain 50 bonus Aphotic Points. Casting Signature - Weave: Splashing Thunder will trigger Matrix if it is not on cooldown.
Upon entering battle, the first Resolute Blow cast will restore an addition of 20 Signature Energy. Base DMG of Signal Orb Skills and Resolute Blow increases by  50%.

When Alpha is holding the odachi, making a 3-Ping will grant her a 15% Extra DMG Bonus. The Base DMG of Signature - Weave: Karmic Inferno and Unquenchable Flare's Leaping Thrust increase by 60% and 50% respectively. Alpha's swordwave becomes enhanced when casting Blading Radiance for the first time after entering the battlefield.
- When enhanced, swordwave's Base DMG increases by 100%. Casting enhanced swordwaves also restores 3 Signature Energy every 0.3s and 25 Aphotic Points every  0.5s.
Extra DMG Bonus of Unquenchable Flare's Thunderous Bash and  Resolute Blow increases by 30%.
Extra DMG Bonus of Unquenchable Flare's Leaping Thrust and 3-Ping Skills increases by 50%.
Extra DMG Bonus of  Signature - Weave: Karmic Inferno increases by 50%.

leap.name: Mist-Trailing Bolt
description:
**Setting 1(Lightning gameplay):**
While casting Leaping Thrust, Red and Yellow Signal Orbs are converted into Shadow Strike Orbs. Pinging any Shadow Strike Orb will transition into Shadow Strike.
- Lucia throws the odachi to deal 60% Umbrasurge DMG. Each Shadow Strike Orb pinged unleashes 1 hit of Shadow Strike (up to 6 hits) that deals 450% Umbrasurge DMG, restores 1 Signature Energy and 15 Aphotic Points. Afterwards, casts Shadow: Thunderous Bash, dealing 940% Umbrasurge DMG.
- After fully casting 6 hits of Shadow Strike, the next [Signature Move - Weave: Karmic Inferno] will deal 2600% Umbrasurge DMG instead.

**Setting 2(Umbra gameplay):**
While casting Leaping Thrust, continuing holding Basic Attack will convert Red Orbs and Yellow Orbs into Shadow Strike Orbs and transition into Shadow Strike.
- Lucia throws the odachi to deal 60% Umbrasurge DMG. Each Shadow Strike Orb pinged unleashes 1 hit of Shadow Strike (up to 6 hits, continuously tapping or holding Basic Attack automatically pings Shadow Strike Orbs) that deals 450% Umbrasurge DMG, restores 1 Signature Energy and 15 Aphotic Points. Afterwards, casts Shadow: Thunderous Bash, dealing 940% Umbrasurge DMG.
- After fully casting 6 hits of Shadow Strike, the next [Signature Move - Weave: Karmic Inferno] will deal 2600% Umbrasurge DMG instead.
- If CUB Motorbolt is in Standby Mode, you must ping any Shadow Strike Orb during Leaping Thrust to transition into Shadow Strike.
level9:
**Level 9**: Each Umbrasurge stack increases the Base DMG of Shadow Strike by 10%.
- [Signature Move - Weave: Karmic Inferno] will clear all Umbrasurge stacks and add Umbrasurge DMG equal to the number of stacks consumed x 400%.
level18:
**Level 18**: For every Aphotic Point consumed by Thunderous Bash or Shadow: Thunderous Bash, increases the Base DMG of the next [Signature Move - Weave: Karmic Inferno] by 0.15% (does not stack).
- [SS Passive - Drifting Vain] added effect: Each Umbrasurge stack increases the Base DMG of Shadow Strike by an additional 5%.

leap.name: Conviction of Nimitta
description: Base DMG of [Core Passive - Resolute Blow] increases by 60%. Allows 2 additional parries during Parry Stance.
level9: **Level 9**: If a Red 3-Ping or Yellow 3-Ping is cast, followed by [Core Passive - Sundered Delusion] within the next 3s, increases the gain rate of Blade Aura and automatically rapid casts [Core Passive - Resolute Blow] once Blade Aura reaches maximum.
level18:
**Level 18**: Upon entering the battlefield, gain 9 Signature Energy.
- [SSS Passive - Facets of Delusions] added effect: After casting [Signature Move - Weave: Karmic Inferno], increases the Base DMG of [QTE - Flashes of Steel] by 1000% for the rest of the battle. Adds additional Umbrasurge DMG to [Signature Move - Weave: Karmic Inferno] equal to the number of stacks consumed x 200%.

leap.name: Thunder-Ruling Armaments
description: Adds [Affix: Umbrasurge] to [Core Passive - Path of Anatta]:

Every 200 Umbrasurge points accumulated will increase the number of Umbrasurge stacks by 1, up to 15 stacks. Characters with the Umbrasurge Affix will obtain an Umbrasurge Aura based on the current number of Umbrasurge stacks, continuously dealing a small amount of Umbrasurge DMG to enemies and reducing their HP recovery. Reaching a threshold number of Umbrasurge stacks will upgrade the Umbrasurge Aura, expand its range, and deal a large amount of Umbrasurge DMG to enemies within.

- At 1/3/6/10/15 stacks: Deals 100%/200%/400%/800%/1600% Umbrasurge DMG, then deals 20%/40%/60%/80%/100% Umbrasurge per second and reduces the enemy's HP regeneration by 10%/20%/30%/50%/100%.; pinging Blue Signal Orbs generates 50/100/200 Umbrasurge points. Casting [Core Passive - Resolute Blow] while holding the kodachi generates 50/100/200 Umbrasurge points. Continuously unleashing swordwaves through [Basic Attack - Blading Radiance] generates 60 Umbrasurge points every 0.5s and enhanced swordwaves generate an additional 100 Umbrasurge points.
level9:
**Level 9**: Base DMG of Signal Orbs increases by 50%.
- When any orb is pinged for the first time upon triggering Matrix, a maximum of 1 orb will be consumed.
level18:
**Level 18**:  While holding the kodachi, all Signal Orbs are converted into Blue Orbs.
- [SSS+ Passive - Glimpse Into All] added effect: Gain 15% Extra DMG Bonus when holding the odachi.

description: Hanying gains 1 Dancer Point after any 3-Ping, up to 4 Points.

skills.name: Dance of Emerald Flow
skills.button_press: At least 1 Dancer Point + Tap Dodge
description:
After spending 1 Dancer Point, Hanying will perform a Choreography, entering Dancer Stance, recovering 16 Signature Energy, and gaining 1 stack of Emerald Flow. In Dancer Stance, all Signal Orbs will be converted into Dance Orbs (with color unchanged) that cast Poise of Emerald Flow when pinged, and Hanying can only perform 1-Pings.

Hanying gains Super Armor and 50% DMG Reduction while casting Poise of Emerald Flow. Each stack of Emerald Flow will increase the Base DMG of  Poise of Emerald Flow or Vision of Mountains by 20% (max 4 stacks). Exiting Dancer Stance will reset Emerald Flow to 0.

Performing 4 consecutive Choreographies will leave behind a healing zone that restores the HP of allies in the area and grants **Ultralimit Torque**, which increases Physical DMG.
result: - Choreography deals **{0}%** Physical DMG.
- The healing zone restores allies' HP equal to 20% of Hanying's ATK for 4s.
- **Ultralimit Torque**: Increases Physical DMG by 10% for 8s. Recasting will refresh the duration.

skills.name: Fledgling Wings
description: No. 21: Feral generates a Shield equal to  50% of Max HP for 12s at the cost of  25% of her current HP when casting a 3-Ping Skill. Triggering this again will refresh the duration and increase the Shield value up to  100% of No. 21's Max HP. No. 21 gains Super Armor when having Shield.

skills.name: Dusk Fluorescence
description: After casting a 3-Ping Skill, No. 21 will enter the  Predator Stance. Tap Basic Attack in this stance to cast  Forceful Pounce to deal Lightning DMG, gain  Wolfspirit Points, and restore HP to allies within range. When a  purple mark appears, immediately tapping Basic Attack will cast a more powerful  Dead-on Pounce and gain more  Wolfspirit Points. During  Forceful Pounce and  Dead-on Pounce, No. 21 will gain Super Armor and  70% DMG Reduction.
result: - Red Orb 3-Ping: Forceful Pounce deals **{0}%** Lightning DMG in total. Dead-on Pounce deals **{1}%** Lightning DMG in total.
- Yellow Orb 3-Ping: Forceful Pounce deals **{2}%** Lightning DMG in total. Dead-on Pounce deals **{3}%** Lightning DMG in total.
- Blue Orb 3-Ping: Forceful Pounce deals **{4}%** Lightning DMG in total. Dead-on Pounce deals **{5}%** Lightning DMG in total.
- Wolfspirit Points are capped at 240.
- Casting Forceful Pounce grants 80 Wolfspirit Points while casting Dead-on Pounce grants 160 Wolfspirit Points.
- Casting Forceful Pounce and Dead-on Pounce will restore HP equal to **{6}%** of No. 21's ATK to her allies within range.

skills.name: Forest Predator
description: Every time entering the battlefield or casting  Signature - Sky-ripping Arcflash, No. 21: Feral will activate  Forest Predator, during which extra Signal Orbs can be pinged when casting a 3-Ping Skill to generate a  Deceleration Field and add additional Lightning DMG to  Dusk Fluorescence. When there is a  Deceleration Field, No. 21 will be invincible, the enemies will be slowed down temporarily, and  Dusk Fluorescence's purple mark will last until the  Deceleration Field is gone. Casting  Dusk Fluorescence will deactivate the  Deceleration Field. When No. 21 casts  Dusk Fluorescence and deals Lightning DMG, the Signal Orbs will be rearranged into 3-Ping sets.
result: - Up to 3 extra Signal Orbs can be pinged when casting Forest Predator. The record will be reset when Forest Predator is cast again.
- Each Signal Orb pinged will trigger a Deceleration Field for 0.5s. The Deceleration Field can be stacked.
- Each Signal Orb pinged will deal an additional 340% Lightning DMG 1 more time when casting Dusk Fluorescence.

skills.name: Wolfspirit Release

description: With max  Wolfspirit Points, press and hold Basic Attack to enter  Wolfspirit Form. When continuously holding or repeatedly tapping Basic Attack,  Growling Wolfspirit will be cast with  Wolfspirit Points. It will end with  Scratch Reap once all  Wolfspirit Points are depleted.  Growling Wolfspirit and  Scratch Reap will pull targets within range and deal Lightning DMG, granting Signature Energy to No. 21 and restoring HP to her allies within range. No. 21 can adjust her position by dodging with Super Armor and  30% DMG Reduction granted in  Wolfspirit Form.
result: - Each Growling Wolfspirit consumes 15 Wolfspirit Points, deals **{0}%** Lightning DMG, grants No. 21 2 Signature Energy, and restores HP equal to **{1}%** of her ATK to her allies within range.
- Scratch Reap deals **{2}%** Lightning DMG, grants No. 21 20 Signature Energy, and restores HP equal to **{3}%** of her ATK to her allies within range.

- In the Wolfspirit Form, each Growling Wolfspirit grants 5 Critical Arclight, while each Scratch Reap grants 20 Critical Arclight.

Signature - Sky-ripping Arcflash's Extra DMG Bonus increases by  20%.

skills.name: Impact Nullification
description: Noctis enters a defense stance and can dodge attacks in this state. Dodging successfully will trigger Arm Block. When performing a precise dodge, Noctis will trigger Perfect Arm Block to counterattack.
result: - Restores 60 Energy after triggering Arm Block.
- Restores 120 Energy after triggering Perfect Arm Block, entering Matrix and gaining 1 random Signal Orb.
- The counterattack deals **{0}%** Lightning DMG.

skills.button_press: Thunder Burst Form + Any Signal Orb
description: In the Thunder Burst Form, the rightmost single orb will be converted into an Overload Orb. The Overload Orb will be converted into a Blast Orb 2.5s later.

skills.button_press: Thunder Burst Form + Any Signal Orb + Ping Overload Orb
description: The Overload Orb will mark a single orb. Pinging the Overload Orb will ping the marked orb as well and cast Thunderous Fury afterward, dealing Lightning DMG.
result: - Deals **{0}%** Lightning DMG in total.

description: Press and hold Basic Attack while casting Thunderous Fury to perform Thunderclap Strike, gaining Super Armor, dealing Lightning DMG, and receive 1 Engine Point. Engine Points will amplify the Base DMG of Skull Crush.
result: - Each stack of Engine Points amplifies Base DMG of Skull Crush by 80%. Stacks up to 3 times.
- Deals **{0}%** Lightning DMG in total.

Press and hold Basic Attack when Noctis performs any 3-Ping Skill in the Thunder Burst Form to execute a follow-up attack, casting Lightning Smash, Lightning Punch, or Lightning Sweep based on the color of the orbs and resetting Thunder Burst Form's duration.
result: - Deals **{0}%** Lightning DMG in total.
- Unable to gain Energy in the Thunder Burst Form.

Extra DMG Bonus of 3-Ping Skills increases by 40%.
Extra DMG Bonus of Thunderous Fury and Thunderclap Strike increases by 40%.
Extra DMG Bonus of Signature - Skull Crush increases by 40%.

skills.name: Cipher of Synergy
description: Cecily fights alongside Echo. Press and hold Basic Attack to make Echo enter Tactical Cipher. In Tactical Cipher, Signal Orbs will be temporarily replaced by Cipher Orbs.
Pinging a Cipher Orb will make Cecily fire a swordwave at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG. Cecily will then act based on the color of the Cipher Orbs pinged.
result: Each swordwave deals **{0}%** Physical DMG.
Red Cipher: Launches a thrust attack at the enemy, dealing **{1}%** Physical DMG.
Yellow Cipher: Launches a downward thrust from above, pulling in nearby enemy units and dealing **{2}%** Physical DMG.
Blue Cipher: Slashes the target, restoring HP equal to **{3}%** of Echo's ATK to allies and dealing **{4}%** Physical DMG.

skills.name: Sinbreaker's Judgment
skills.button_press: During Tactical Cipher + Ping Cipher Orbs consecutively
description: Upon entering Tactical Cipher, Echo starts charging, during which time Cecily will prevent enemies from attacking her and repel them. Echo gains Super Armor for 1.5s and 40% DMG Reduction. Cooldown: 5s. Keep pinging Cipher Orbs or drag the joystick to keep charging.

When orbs are no longer pinged or when the joystick is released, Echo will stop charging and fire a Sinbreaker's Arrow, dealing Physical DMG. Echo can dodge attacks when performing this move. Cecily will then attack in the order of the Cipher Orbs pinged, with each attack consuming one Cipher Orb. After Echo exits the battlefield, Cecily will stay and continue to attack enemies until all Cipher Orbs are consumed.
result: - When fully charged, Sinbreaker's Arrow deals **{0}%** Physical DMG, rearranges all Signal Orbs into 3-Pings, and activates Judgment Zone, which heals allies within for **{1}%** of Echo's ATK for 8s and grants Echo 6 Signature Energy.
- If Sinbreaker's Arrow is not fully charged, it will only deal **{2}%** Physical DMG without activating Judgment Zone.

skills.name: Majestic Splendor
description: Each orb pinged inside Judgment Zone will generate 10 Splendor Points, max 90.

skills.name: Swift Archery
description: Tapping Dodge inside Judgment Zone will trigger Swift Archery, dealing Physical DMG.
result: Deals **{0}%** Physical DMG.

skills.name: Judgment Co-Strike
skills.button_press: In Judgment Zone + 90 Splendor Points + Ping One Specific Signal Orb
description: At max Splendor Points, pinging a Signal Orb that matches the color of Cipher Orb inside Judgment Zone will trigger a Co-Strike. The first Co-Strike after Judgment Zone is activated will cast Imprisoning Co-Strike.
If Echo has Soul Shatter Mark, she can trigger another Co-Strike afterward while the Judgment Zone is still active to cast Soulbreaking Co-Strike.
result: - Imprisoning Co-Strike: Consumes all Splendor Points to imprison and pull in nearby enemies, dealing **{0}%** Physical DMG and restoring 36 Signature Energy.
- Soulbreaking Co-Strike: Consumes Soul Shatter Mark to leap and shoot the target, dealing **{1}%** Physical DMG and restoring 20 Signature Energy.
- Echo becomes invincible during a Co-Strike but cannot cast Signature - Celestial Edge.
- Echo gains Soul Shatter Mark after casting Signature - Celestial Edge.

skills.name: Blessing of Fortitude
description: Allies are granted **Ultralimit Torque** which increases their Physical DMG by 10% for 8s after being healed. The duration resets every time it is triggered.

skills.name: Signature Move
description: Echo and Cecily attack at the same time, dealing Physical DMG and triggering Time Lag Calculation. Afterward, Echo gains Soul Shatter Mark.
result: - Deal **{0}%** Physical DMG in total.

qte.description: Fires multiple arrows at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG and healing HP.
result: - Deals **{0}%** Physical DMG and heals for **{1}%** of ATK in total.

leader.name: Harbinger of Law

class.name: Amplifier
class.description: All switched-in members gain an extra **{0}%** ATK and **{1}%** Elemental DMG Bonus of the Amplifier's element for 10s.

levels.desc: Casting Imprisoning Co-Strike and Soulbreaking Co-Strike will activate all available QTEs.
Gains a set of 3-Ping Orbs when switched in. While Judgment Zone is active, Extra DMG Bonus increases by 30%.
When Echo is switched out, Cecily immediately gains 6 bonus Cipher Orbs. After Echo exits the battlefield, Cecily gains 100% Extra DMG Bonus.
The effect of Amplifier Class Skill increases by 100%. Echo gains 30 Splendor Points and Soul Shatter Mark every time she enters the battlefield. Soulbreaking Co-Strike's Base DMG increases by 50%.
Extra DMG Bonus of Signature - Celestial Edge increases by 30%.
Extra DMG Bonus of 3-Ping skills and Cipher Orb skills increases by 50%.
Extra DMG Bonus of Imprisoning Co-Strike and Soulbreaking Co-Strike increase by 30%.

leap.name: Ceaseless Strings
description:
[Core Passive - Echoing Twins] **New Effect: Glaciation.**
 Certain skills fill the **Glaciation Gauge**. When full, the Gauge will clear itself and unleash **Diamond Dust**, dealing Hiemal DMG and accumulating a **Diamond Dust stack**. Casting an eligible skill will consume all **Diamond Dust stacks** and create an **Ice Spike** that deals Hiemal DMG to its surroundings.

If the character deals Hiemal DMG while the **Ice Spike** is on-field, triggers **Crystallization**, dealing additional Hiemal DMG and generating **Glaciation** points.

When the Ice Spike's on-field duration expires, triggers **Icebreak**, dealing Hiemal DMG based on the current **Glaciation points**. The **Glaciation Gauge**, **Diamond Dust stacks**, **Ice Spike**, and **Glaciation points** will carry over between characters with the Glaciation Affix.

- When **Glaciation points** reaches **100**, unleashes **Diamond Dust** that deals 100% Hiemal DMG and accumulates **1 Diamond Dust stack**, up to **10** stacks.
- If there is at least 1 **Diamond Dust stack**, certain skills can clear all **Diamond Dust stacks** and create an **Ice Spike** on-field, dealing **180%** Hiemal DMG. The **Ice Spike**'s duration increases by 1s for every Diamond Dust stack consumed.
- While the **Ice Spike** exists, if the character deals Hiemal DMG, triggers **Crystallization**, dealing **100%** Hiemal DMG to enemies in a large area and generating **100 Glaciation points**. Can be triggered once every **0.25**s.
- When the **Ice Spike**'s duration expires, triggers **Icebreak** to deal **100%** Hiemal DMG to enemies in a large area. Base DMG of **Icebreak** increases by **9%** for every **100 Glaciation points**. The maximum **Glaciation points** is **10000**.

When Judgement Zone is not active, Echo can hold Dodge to fire a Frigid Arrow, dealing 800% Glaciation DMG and activating Crystalline Zone for 8s. After Splendor Points reaches maximum inside Crystalline Zone, Echo can hold Basic Attack to consume all Spendor Points and cast Anguishing Co-Strike (gaining invincibility but unable to cancel with Signature - Celestial Edge), imprisoning and pulling in nearby enemies, dealing 2400% Glaciation DMG, restoring 50 Signature Energy to Echo, and activating all available QTEs.
Anguishing Co-Strike consumes all Cipher Orbs, up to an equal number of Signal Orbs, and the Soul Shatter Mark if held, then grants corresponding bonuses for the Glaciation Effect.

- Each Cipher Orb increases the Base DMG of Gelid and the Ice Spike by 4%, and each Signal Orb increases the Base DMG of Crystallize by 25% for 24s. Triggering this effect will renew its duration. The Soul Shatter Mark enhances the effect of Crystalline Points, every 100 Crystalline Points increasing the Base DMG of the next Cryoshatter by 200% (does not stack).
level9:
**Level 9**: While an Ice Spike is active, Echo's [Signature - Celestial Edge] resets the Ice Spike's duration to 10s, and [QTE - Advent of Justice] extends the duration by 4s and deals 600% Glaciation DMG instead. Cecily's Cipher attacks deal an additional 200% Glaciation DMG and accumulate 100 Crystalline Points for the team..
- The Ice Spike's duration cannot exceed 10s.
level18:
**Level 18**: Base DMG of Anguishing Co-Strike, Imprisoning Co-Strike, and Soulbreaking Co-Strike increase by 50%.
[Passive - Decisive Omen] added effect: Increases the final effect of Ultralimit Torque applied by [Core Passive - Blessing of Fortitude] by 5%. While Echo has an active Crystalline Emblem, she instead grants the Frostbound Nova effect that increases Glaciation DMG by 5%. While an Ice Spike is active, Cecily's Cipher attacks accumulate an additional 200 Crystalline Points for the team instead.

leap.name: Penetrating Icicles
description:
Inside Crystalline Zone, [Core Passive - Swift Archery] deals 160% Glaciation DMG instead, restores 20 Signature Energy and 30 Splendor Points for Echo, grants 4 Cipher Orbs to Cecily, and additionally casts Silver Rain, dealing 240% Glaciation DMG.
- In every Crystalline Zone activated, Echo can cast [Core Passive - Swift Archery] a maximum of 6 times.
level9: **Level 9**: Base DMG of [Core Passive - Swift Archery] and Silver Rain increases by 100%.
level18:
**Level 18**: Base DMG of Sinbreaker's Arrow increases by 100%. The first time this skill is cast upon entering the battlefield, restores 16 Signature Energy and 60 Splendor Points for Echo. 
- [Passive - Mark of Libra Lv.2] added effect: Increases the final effect of Ultralimit Torque applied by [Core Passive - Blessing of Fortitude] by 5%. While Echo has an active Crystalline Emblem, she instead grants the Frostbound Nova effect that increases Glaciation DMG by 5%. While Crystalline Zone is active, Echo gains 20% Extra DMG Bonus.

leap.name: Decisive Revelation
description:
Inside Crystalline Zone, [Signature - Celestial Edge] deals 3200% Glaciation DMG instead, and activates Crystalline Emblem for 15s. Triggering this effect or exiting the battlefield will renew its duration.
While an Ice Spike is active, the Crystalline Emblem is regarded as active.
While Echo has an active Crystalline Emblem, her [Class - Amplifier] grants an Ice buff instead, and [Core Passive - Blessing of Fortitude] instead grants the Frost Crystal effect that increases Ice DMG by the same amount.
level9:
**Level 9**: Consuming a Soul Shatter Mark increases the Base DMG of the next [Signature - Celestial Edge] by 50% (does not stack).
After casting [Signature - Celestial Edge], Echo pings 2 Cipher Orbs for Cecily and leaves behind Snowmelt, healing allies for 20% of Echo's ATK every second for 12s.
level18:
**Level 18**: Inside Crystalline Zone, Echo deals 100% Glaciation DMG to nearby enemies per second. Inside Judgement Zone, Echo deals 100% Physical DMG to nearby enemies per second.
[Passive - Dreamer's Shore Lv.3] added effect: When any Zone is active, Echo gains 30% Extra DMG Bonus.

When Lamia is in Tidal Form, casting Basic Attacks grants her Extra DMG Bonus, after which she will leave Tidal Form.

- While enhanced, Lamia gains 5 Signature Energy every 0.5s.
- Casting one full cycle of Basic Attacks in Tidal Form grants 30% Extra DMG Bonus, Super Armor, and 70% DMG Reduction.

Making a Yellow 3-Ping after a Yellow 1/2-Ping allows Lamia to directly perform the slash attack. While casting this skill, Lamia gains Fathomless Points and a small amount of Abyssal Points.

skills.name: Antimony
description: When Lamia is in Primary Form, she can only cast Yellow or Blue Orb skills, and her Basic Attacks only generate Yellow or Blue Orbs.
When she is in Dark Tide Form, she can only cast Red or Blue Orb skills, and her Basic Attacks only generate Red or Blue Orbs. Yellow Orbs will be randomly converted into Red or Blue Orbs.

skills.name: Wave Illusions
description: When Lamia casts a 3-Ping skill in Primary Form, there is a short window of time in which she can consecutively cast another 3-Ping, Torrent Orb, or Tidal Orb skill. After Lamia casts a Red Orb skill in Dark Tide Form, consecutively pinging Red Orbs allows her to cast the skill again directly during the skill action.
After Lamia casts a Blue Orb skill in Dark Tide Form, she will start swimming in water, during which she can cast the skill again to rapidly fire water spheres to attack the target.

skills.name: Drowned Conformation
skills.button_press: Primary Form + Ping Torrent Orb / Tidal Orb
description: When Lamia casts skills through orb pings in Primary Form, she will gain Fathomless Points. For every 30 Fathomless Points, she will gain a Torrent Orb. When two Torrent Orbs are present, they will merge into a Tidal Orb.

At full Fathomless Points, pinging a Torrent Orb or Tidal Orb will deplete all Fathomless Points. When a Torrent Orb is pinged, Lamia will cast Crushing Wave, dealing Dark DMG to enemies in front while also dealing a small amount DMG to herself. When a Tidal Orb is pinged, she will cast Suffocating Tide to pull in surrounding enemies, then detonate the undercurrents to deal Dark DMG.

After casting Crushing Wave or Suffocating Tide, Lamia gains Ocean's Scar. Pinging a Torrent Orb will change the weather to Downpour. Pinging a Tidal Orb or two Torrent Orbs will change the weather to Storm. Lamia gains Super Armor and 70% DMG Reduction while casting Crushing Wave or Suffocating Tide.
result: - Fathomless Points has a maximum of 60.
- Pinging a Torrent Orb will cast Crushing Wave, dealing **{0}%** Dark DMG in total.
- Pinging a Tidal Orb will cast Suffocating Tide, dealing **{1}%** Dark DMG in total.
- Each Torrent Orb pinged grants 25 Abyssal Points and 15 Signature Energy.
- Each Tidal Orb pinged grants 60 Abyssal Points and 30 Signature Energy.

skills.name: Dark Flux
skills.button_press: Dark Tide Form + Ping Torrent Orb / Tidal Orb
description: When Lamia casts skills through orb pings in Dark Tide Form, she will gain Fathomless Points. For every 30 Fathomless Points, she will gain a Torrent Orb. When two Torrent Orbs are present, they will merge into a Tidal Orb.

When Torrent Orb and Tidal Orb are both present, the Torrent Orb will be pinged to enhance the Tidal Orb, turning it into Riptide Orb. At full Fathomless Points, pinging a Torrent Orb, Tidal Orb, or Riptide Orb will deplete all Fathomless Points. When a Torrent Orb is pinged, Lamia will cast Crushing Torrent, slashing to create powerful airflows, dealing Dark DMG to enemies in front, and entering Tidal Form.
description2: When a Tidal Orb or Riptide Orb is pinged, Lamia will cast Tidal Vortex, dealing Dark DMG. If Lamia is not in Tidal Form when casting Tidal Vortex, she will ascend to the highest point to cast Tidal Vortex, and then exit Tidal Form. Lamia gains Ocean's Scar after casting Crushing Torrent or Tidal Vortex. Lamia gains Super Armor and 70% DMG Reduction while casting Crushing Torrent and Tidal Vortex.
result: - Fathomless Points has a maximum of 90.
- Pinging a Torrent Orb will cast Crushing Torrent, dealing **{0}%** Dark DMG in total.
- Pinging a Tidal Orb will cast Tidal Vortex, dealing **{1}%** Dark DMG in total.
- Pinging a Riptide Orb will cast an even more powerful Tidal Vortex, dealing **{2}%** Dark DMG in total.
- Each Torrent Orb pinged grants 25 Abyssal Points and 15 Signature Energy.
- Each Tidal Orb pinged grants 60 Abyssal Points and 30 Signature Energy.
- Each Riptide Orb pinged grants 105 Abyssal Points and 35 Signature Energy.

skills.name: Raging Prelude
description: Lamia summons nearby water to engulf the surroundings and plunge the battlefield into a nameless ocean, dealing Dark DMG to the target. She then enters Dark Tide Form and gains Signal Orbs based on the weather. Time Lag Calculation is triggered while she casts this move.
result: - Deals **{0}%** Dark DMG in total.
- Gains 1 set of 3-Ping Orbs in Downpour.
- Gains 2 sets of 3-Ping Orbs in Storm.
- Downpour and Tempest will cease after casting this move.

description: Lamia stirs up and pulls together several whirlpools, then detonates them to annihilate enemies in the ocean, dealing Dark DMG to the target. After casting this move, she enters Primary Form. Time Lag Calculation is triggered while she casts this move.
result: - Deals **{0}%** Dark DMG in total.

qte.name: Tidal Phantom
qte.description: Swings Halberd Blade at the target, dealing Dark DMG.
result: - Deals **{0}%** Dark DMG in total.

leader.name: Cornflower's Shadow
leader.description: Increases Dark DMG of all members by 10%. Increases ATK of all Attackers by 10%.

class.name: Attacker
class.description: Extra DMG Bonus increases by **{0}%**.

levels.desc: Consuming Tidal Orb in Primary Form or casting Basic Attack - Abyssal Currents will activate all available QTEs.
Gains one extra Torrent Orb each time upon entering battle. Base DMG of Torrent Orb, Tidal Orb, and Riptide Orb increases by 50%. Gains 15% Extra DMG Bonus in Dark Tide Form.

Gains 20 extra Signature Energy when pinging a Tidal Orb in Primary Form for the first time after entering battle. Base DMG of Signal Orb skills and Primary Form's Basic Attack bonus hits increases by 30%.

Gains one extra Torrent Orb each time upon entering battle. Pinging Tidal Orb in Primary Form grants 10 additional Signature Energy. Signature - Raging Prelude deals 4500% Dark DMG when the weather is Storm. Maximum limit of Abyssal Points increases to 600. Casting Torrent Orb, Tidal Orb, or 3-Ping Orb skills in Dark Tide Form grants 200% more Abyssal Points.
Extra DMG Bonus of Basic Attack - Abyssal Currents increases by 20%.
Extra DMG Bonus of Torrent Orb, Tidal Orb, Riptide Orb, and 3-Ping Orb skills increases by 40%.
Signature - Sunken Finale gains an Extra DMG Bonus based on the pings in the Dark Tide Form, with each orb pinged granting a 3% bonus, up to 16 orbs.

While BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER is airborne during Photon Strike, she gains DMG Reduction briefly and is able to block incoming attacks when Basic Attack is released.

skills.name: Iterative Glitch

description: Ping Combo 3 will summon Grizzly Chomp to fly toward Decryptor. She can either perform an Extreme Dodge to trigger the Matrix, or knock Grizzly Chomp away with Grizzly Paws or Grizzly Stomp for a follow-up joint attack.
result: - Grizzly Chomp will deal **{0}%** Dark DMG if knocked away by Grizzly Paws.

- Grizzly Chomp will deal **{1}%** Dark DMG and restore 60 Signature Energy to Decryptor if knocked away by Grizzly Stomp when Decryptor is not in Analysis Mode. If she is in Analysis Mode, Grizzly Chomp will deal **{2}%** Dark DMG and extend Analysis Mode for 2s.

skills.name: Thorough Analysis
skills.button_press: Not in Analysis Mode + At least 200 Signature Energy + Press and Hold Signature
description: Decryptor unleashes all her computing power and enters Analysis Mode, dealing **{0}%** Dark DMG and gaining up to 150 Analysis Points based on her moves during so.
result: - In Analysis Mode, Decryptor cannot restore Signature Energy and will consume 30 Signature Energy every second (This effect stops when she leaves the battlefield).

skills.name: Chordal Dissonance
skills.button_press: Analysis Mode + Press and Hold Signature, or Use Up All Signature Energy to Auto Cast
description: Decryptor spends all Signature Energy and exits Analysis Mode to cast Chordal Dissonance, dealing **{0}%** Dark DMG. When Analysis Points reach 150, Chordal Dissonance is Played Back, dealing **{1}%** Dark DMG again. Each Analysis Point will increase the Base DMG of Chordal Dissonance and Play Back by 1%.
result: - Chordal Dissonance also detonates the Hacked Mark, dealing **{0}%** Dark DMG to the hacked target.

skills.name: Ambient Mix
description: Decryptor's attacks charge the Grizzly Stomp. Casting this skill will summon Grizzly Stomp to kick the target with different strengths based on the charge level, dealing Dark DMG before resetting the charge level.
result: - The charge level starts at Lv.0, dealing **{0}%** Dark DMG. It increases to Lv.1 after the 1st Basic Attack, dealing **{1}%** Dark DMG. It increases to Lv.2 after the 2nd Basic Attack, dealing **{2}%** Dark DMG. It increases to Lv.3 after the 3rd Basic Attack, dealing **{3}%** Dark DMG. It increases to Lv.4 every after gaining 3 Computing Points, dealing **{4}%** Dark DMG. It increases to Lv.5 for a limited time after Grizzly Chomp flies toward Decryptor, dealing **{5}%** Dark DMG.

qte.name: Hacking Protocol
qte.description: Decryptor rides the Grizzly Paws to scatter musical notes, dealing **{0}%** Dark DMG. Afterward, generates the Integer Overflow Field for 4s.

leader.name: "Secured Domain"
leader.description: Increases HP of all members by 10%.

class.name: Support
class.description: Healing amount increases by **{0}%**.

levels.desc:
The Base DMG of Coupling increases by 150%.
Chordal Dissonance will rearrange the Red and Yellow Orbs into sets of 3-Pings.

Gains 3 Computing Points every time upon entering the battlefield.
Decryptor's Dark DMG increases by 20% when in Analysis Mode.

Pinging Stress Orb also generates the Integer Overflow Field for 8s.
Doubles the Dark DMG increase from Decryptor's **Dark Radiation**.

Each Analysis Point will further increase the Base DMG of Chordal Dissonance and Play Back by 0.4%. When Analysis Points reach 150, the Base DMG of Chordal Dissonance and Play Back increases by 150%, and Chordal Dissonance grants 3 Signal Orbs of a random color.
Extra DMG Bonus of Thorough Analysis, Chordal Dissonance, and Play Back increases by 30%.
Extra DMG Bonus of 3-Pings increases by 100%.

Extra DMG Bonus of Coupling and Overflow increases by 50%.
Decryptor's **Dark Radiation** increases Karenina: Scire's ATK by 10%.

basic_attack.name: Gibbous Halo

result: - Deals **{0}%** Nihil DMG. The 5th hit will retrieve the Chakram and restore additional 20 Crescent Points.

basic_attack.description: Alternates between the Chakram and the Wingblade to attack the enemy, dealing Nihil DMG. When in Main Sequence, the 4th and 6th hit will restore additional Crescent Points.
result: - Deals **{0}%** Nihil DMG. When in Main Sequence, the 4th and 6th hit will restore additional 20 Crescent Points.

basic_attack.name: Reaping Moon
basic_attack.description: Press and hold Basic Attack to activate Reaping Moon, continuously pulling in nearby enemies and granting Crescent Points. During so, Luna: Oblivion gains Super Armor and 50% DMG Reduction, is unable to restore the Dodge Gauge, and triggers Dodge automatically when hit.
result: - During Reaping Moon, restores 40 Crescent Points per second.
- Can gain up to 90 Crescent Points.

basic_attack.name: Shattering Moon
basic_attack.description: During Reaping Moon, release Basic Attack at 0 / 45 / 90 Crescent Points to cast Shattering Moon. Upon casting, Luna: Oblivion slowly ascends into the air to execute a plunging attack, pulling in nearby enemies and dealing Nihil DMG. During so, she gains Super Armor, 50% DMG Reduction, and is unable to restore the Dodge Gauge.
result: - Casts Shattering Moon automatically at max Crescent Points.
- When in Nova, Shattering Moon deals **{0}%** / **{1}%** / **{2}%** Nihil DMG.
- When in Main Sequence / Finality, Luna: Oblivion changes her attacks, slashing enemies with the Wingblade in a large area instead and dealing **{3}%** / **{4}%** / **{5}%** Nihil DMG.
- - Becomes invincible upon casting Shattering Moon at max Crescent Points. This will clear all Crescent Points, activate Eclipse Stance, and restore 24 Signature Energy.

basic_attack.name: Gibbous Edge

basic_attack.description: After casting the 2nd hit of Basic Attack or Yellow Orb Skill, the Chakram remains on the field, continuously dealing Nihil DMG. When the Chakram is present, Basic Attack starts from the 3rd hit.
result: - The Chakram deals **{0}%** Nihil DMG to nearby enemies every 0.5s for 1.5s.

red_orb.name: Swirdling Darkstar

result: - Deals **{0}%** / **{1}%** / **{2}%** Nihil DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.
- Retrieves the Chakram if it's present on the field.
- Gains 10 / 20 / 30 Crescent Points based on the number of orbs pinged.
- Gains 5 / 10 / 15 Eclipse Points based on the number of orbs pinged.

yellow_orb.name: Reddened Naught

result: - Deals **{0}%** / **{1}%** / **{2}%** Nihil DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.

- Gains 10 / 20 / 30 Crescent Points based on the number of orbs pinged.
- Gains 5 / 10 / 15 Eclipse Points based on the number of orbs pinged.

result: - Deals **{0}%** / **{1}%** / **{2}%** Nihil DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.

- Gains 10 / 20 / 30 points Crescent Points based on the number of orbs pinged.
- Gains 5 / 10 / 15 points Eclipse Points based on the number of orbs pinged.

skills.name: Waxing Course
description: Enters Nova upon entering the battlefield. When in Nova, all Signal Orbs will be converted into Yellow Orbs, and Basic Attacks will only generate Yellow Orbs. After entering Main Sequence, all Signal Orbs will be converted into Red and Blue Orbs, and Basic Attacks will only generate Red or Blue Orbs. After entering Finality, Basic Attacks will not generate Signal Orbs, and no Signal Orbs can be pinged except for Finality Orbs.

skills.name: Eclipse Points

result: - Gains 5 / 10 / 15 Eclipse Points based on the number of orbs pinged.
- Gains 45 Eclipse Points upon casting Shattering Moon or  Incipient Retribution at max Crescent Points.
- Can gain up to 300 Eclipse Points.

skills.name: Incipient Retribution

description: When in Main Sequence with Eclipse Stance activated, release Basic Attack during Reaping Moon to cast Incipient Retribution. Upon casting, Luna: Oblivion gathers energy and charges toward the target to pull in nearby enemies and detonate them, dealing Nihil DMG and restoring 24 Signature Energy. She becomes invincible during so, unable to restore the Dodge Gauge or cast Signature - Lunar Downfall.
result: - When Crescent Points are not full, Incipient Retribution deals **{0}%** Nihil DMG.
- When cast at max Crescent Points, Incipient Retribution grants 45 Eclipse Points, deals **{1}%** Nihil DMG, and clears all Crescent Points.

skills.name: Final Retribution

description: When in Finality with Eclipse Stance activated, press and hold Basic Attack to cast Final Retribution. Upon casting, Luna: Oblivion gathers energy and charges toward the target to pull in nearby enemies and detonate them, dealing Nihil DMG and amplifying this damage at the cost of all Eclipse Points. She becomes invincible during so, unable to restore the Dodge Gauge or cast Signature - Lunar Downfall.
result: - Final Retribution deals **{0}%** Nihil DMG. Every 10 Eclipse Points will amplify Base DMG by 4%.

skills.name: Serene Advent
description: When in Finality, Luna: Oblivion consumes Crescent Points continuously but is unable to gain them back through Reaping Moon. Gains Finality Orbs upon Basic Attacks; restores 30 Crescent Points and gains 3 Finality Orbs upon casting Shattering Moon. When the number of Crescent Points falls to 0, exits Finality, and all Finality Orbs will disappear.
result: - In Finality, consumes 10 Crescent Points per second.

- Casts Void Dissipation upon pinging a Finality Orb, dealing **{0}%** Nihil DMG, restoring 12 Signature Energy and 20 Crescent Points. When Eclipse Stance is activated, gains additional 15 Eclipse Points.

skills.name: Agitated Beacon
description: When in Main Sequence / Finality, Luna: Oblivion's Base DMG Efficiency dealt to Equilibrium Field increases by 100%.

result: - Deals **{0}%** Nihil DMG.

skills.name: Finality
skills.button_press: 30 Energy + Press and Hold Signature Move

After casting this skill, gains Eclipse Points based on the number of orbs pinged, increases Crescent Points to the max limit, activates Eclipse Stance, and enters Finality.
result: - Deals **{0}%** Nihil DMG.
- Gains 10 / 20 / 30 / 60 / 90 / 150 Eclipse Points based on the number of orbs pinged.

skills.name: Lunar Downfall

result: - Deals **{0}%** Nihil DMG.
- When cast in Main Sequence, every 10 Eclipse Points will amplify Base DMG by 4%.

qte.name: Befalling Demise
qte.description: Slashes the enemy with the Wingblade, dealing Nihil DMG.
result: - Deals **{0}%** Nihil DMG.

leader.name: Blood Moon
leader.description: Increases Nihil DMG of all members by 10%. Increases ATK of all Annihilators by 20%.

class.name: Annihilator
class.description: Extra DMG Bonus increases by **{0}%**. Elemental Resistance Reduction and DMG Increase applied by any member will become universally effective for all elements.

levels.desc: Casting Incipient Retribution/Final Retribution, Signature - Finality, or Signature - Lunar Downfall will activate all available QTEs.

Casting Signature - Main Sequence or Signature - Finality will trigger Matrix if it is not on cooldown. In Main Sequence, every 10 Eclipse Points amplify the Base DMG of Incipient Retribution by 4%. When exiting the battlefield in Finality, the Chakram will attack once to deal 2000% Nihil DMG.

Base DMG of Signature - Lunar Downfall increases by 20%. Triggering Dodge automatically upon being hit in Reaping Moon will grant 20 Crescent Points. Void Dissipation can also dodge incoming attacks, and dodging successfully will grant 6 Finality Orbs.

The number of Eclipse Points obtained doubles, and the max capacity increases to 600 Points. When casting Signature - Finality, every Signal Orb pinged amplifies the Base DMG of Signature - Finality by 40%, up to 240%. When Luna: Oblivion is in Main Sequence/Finality, her Base DMG dealt to Equilibrium Field increases by 150% instead.
Extra DMG of Signature - Lunar Downfall and Signature - Finality increases by 40%.
Extra DMG of 3-Ping Skills and Void Dissipation increases by 40%.
Extra DMG of Incipient Retribution, Final Retribution, and Shattering Moon cast at max Crescent Points increases by 40%.

result: - Special Effect: Gains 3 Red Orbs.

Additionally, applies **Scorching Invasion** that reduces the target's Fire Resistance.
result: - Fearless Fighter will convert up to 50 Fortification Points into Flash Points for each Red Orb consumed. Bridget: Ardeo can have up to 300 Flash Points. Each converted Fortification Point increases the Base DMG of Fearless Fighter by 1.5% and restores 0.6 Signature Energy to Ardeo.
- **Scorching Invasion** reduces the target's Fire Resistance by 10% for 8s.

red_orb.name: Detect and Counter
red_orb.description:
Upon taking a hit during charging, automatically performs a counterattack. Bridget: Ardeo leaps up and smashes the ground, spending up to 3 Red Orbs, recovering 90 Signature Energy, and dealing **{0}%** Fire DMG. Additionally, applies **Scorching Invasion** on the target, reducing the target's Fire Resistance. Gains Super Armor and 50% DMG Reduction during so.
If she takes a hit during the precast of the charge, the counterattack becomes a rapid assault instead. Bridget unleashes a wave of flame forward, dealing an additional **{1}%** Fire DMG. Becomes Invincible during so.
result: - Detect and Counter will convert up to 150 Fortification Points into Flash Points. Bridget can have up to 300 Flash Points. Each converted Fortification Points will increase the Base DMG of Detect and Counter by 1.5%.
- Detect and Counter is always considered a 3-Ping.
- **Scorching Invasion** reduces the target's Fire Resistance by 10% for 8s.

blue_orb.description: Summons the Energy Shield back and deals **{0}%** / **{1}%** / **{2}%** Fire DMG to enemies on its path based on the number of Blue Orbs consumed when hurling the Energy Shield.

blue_orb.name: Prairie Fire
blue_orb.button_press: At Least 8 Blue Orbs (including Enthalpy Released) + Press and Hold Blue Orb
blue_orb.description: Spends all Blue Orbs to unleash the power of Ignition. Each Blue Orb spent will deal **{0}%** Fire DMG, recover 25 Signature Energy, and produce 250 Combustile Charges. Gains Super Armor during so.

skills.name: Fortify
skills.button_press: Not Moving + Press and Hold Dodge
description: Bridget: Ardeo blocks the attack with her Tactical Tonfas. She cannot move or restore Dodge Gauge during so, and Dodge Gauge is consumed based on the DMG prevented and her max HP when hit (Dodge Gauge is not consumed on a precise block).
result: - If there is enough Dodge Gauge, Bridget: Ardeo is immune to the hit upon a successful block. Otherwise, she gains 50% DMG Reduction for the hit instead.
- After a successful block, recovers 100 Fortification Points, and an additional 50 Fortification Points on a precise block. Bridget can have up to 300 Fortification Points.
- When she enters the battlefield, restores her Fortification Points to 150 if it is below 150.

skills.name: Discharge

result: - Flying Sparks and Whirling Strike can launch the Energy Shield, recovering 50 Fortification Points and consuming 1 Durability.
- The Energy Shield can trigger Detect and Counter and Fortify, consuming 1 Durability
- Triggers available Matrix upon an Extreme Dodge on the Energy Shield.
- When Bridget: Ardeo recovers the Energy Shield, she receives a shield equal to **{0}%** of her Max HP and gains 1 Blue Orb.

skills.name: Effect: Ignition
description:
Combustible: Every 250 Combustible Charges will add 1 Combustible stack, up to 20 stacks.
Ignition: Ignited units take Ignition DMG equal to Ignition stacks x30% (Tank Skills will not be triggered) every second for 10s.
result: - The subsequent unit will inherit the Combustible/Ignition status of the last unit on the battlefield upon its death.

skills.name: Signature Move
description: Thrusts the tonfas into the ground and triggers a firestorm at the cost of all Flash Points, dealing **{0}%** Fire DMG. Becomes Invincible during so and activates all available QTEs.
result: - Each Flash Point will increase the Base DMG of Solar Reactor by 1.5%.
- Solar Reactor will convert Combustible into Ignition of equal stacks.

qte.name: Shattering Punch
qte.description: Dashes forward and pulls in targets, dealing **{0}%** Fire DMG. Additionally, applies **Scorching Invasion** on the target, reducing the target's Fire Resistance.
result: - **Scorching Invasion** reduces the target's Fire Resistance by 10% for 8s.

leader.name: Solidarity
leader.description: Increases DEF of all members by 10%. Increases DMG of Tank Omniframes in the team by 5%.

class.name: Tank
class.description: Attacks reduce the target's Extra DMG Reduction by **{0}%** for 5s.

levels.desc:
Base DMG of Flying Sparks and Whirling Strike increases by 100%.
Bridget: Ardeo gains 2 additional Red Orbs and 2 additional Blue Orbs when she enters the field.

Each Fortification Point will additionally increase the Base DMG of Steel Charge by 1%.
Always recovers 150 Fortification Points after a successful block. Recovers an additional 150 Fortification Points upon entering the battlefield.

Base DMG of Steadfast Foundation increases by 80%.
Final Combo of Flying Sparks and Whirling Strike also applies **Scorching Invasion**, reducing the target's Fire DMG Resistance for 8s.

Each Flash Point will additionally increase the Base DMG of Solar Reactor by 1%.
Ignition DMG from Ardeo increases by 30%.
**Scorching Invasion** inflicted by Ardeo can further reduce the target's Fire DMG Resistance by 5%.
Extra DMG Bonus of Steel Charge increases by 40%.
Extra DMG Bonus of Steadfast Foundation increases by 60%.

Extra DMG Bonus of Solar Reactor increases by 40%.
Ignition DMG from Ardeo increases by 30%.

basic_attack.name: Splendorous Tone - Exquisite Rhyme
basic_attack.button_press: Way of the Strings + Tap Basic Attack

result: - Deals a total of **{0}%** Physical DMG.
- Each move of the attack sequence grants 2 / 4 / 6 / 8 points of Complex Time respectively.

basic_attack.button_press: Way of the Strings + Hold Basic Attack
basic_attack.description: Rapidly plays consecutive notes with the Pipa to attack the target, continuously dealing Physical DMG and gaining Complex Time. While performing this skill, Hanying can move and recover Signal Orbs at an increased rate. Upon releasing Basic Attack, Hanying rushes toward the target, dealing Physical DMG. Hanying can evade incoming attacks during the rush.
result: - Deals **{0}%** Physical DMG and gains 6 points of Complex Time every second.
- The rush deals **{1}%** Physical DMG.

basic_attack.description: Uses the hairpin to perform a series of attacks against the target, dealing Physical DMG and gaining Complex Time. While performing this skill, Hanying recovers Signal Orbs at an increased rate. Attacking after dodging will directly perform the 4th move of the attack sequence.
result: - Deals a total of **{0}%** Physical DMG.
- Each move of the attack sequence grants 3 / 6 / 9 / 12 points of Complex Time respectively.

red_orb.name: Strings Plucked, Sound Abound
red_orb.button_press: Red Orb - Possess at least 1 White Orb + Tap Red Orb
red_orb.description: Quickly plays notes with the Pipa, dealing Physical DMG. Performing this skill consumes 1 White Orb while granting Complex Time, Veiled Edge, and Super Armor. Performing this skill in Matrix is considered a 3-Ping and immediately grants 2 White Orbs.
result: - Deals a total of **{0}%** Physical DMG.
- Performing this skill grants 15 points of Complex Time and 5 points of Veiled Edge.
- Performing this skill grants in Matrix grants 45 points of Complex Time and 15 points of Veiled Edge.

yellow_orb.name: As I Haltingly Lingered

yellow_orb.description: Turns around and plays the Pipa, gathering surrounding targets and dealing Physical DMG. While turning around, Hanying can evade incoming attacks. Performing this skill requires consuming at least 1 White Orb. This skill grants Complex Time and Veiled Edge based on the number of White Orbs consumed. Performing this skill in Matrix consumes only 1 White Orb and will be considered as a 3-Ping.
result: - Deals a total of **{0}%** / **{1}%** / **{2}%** Physical DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.
- Gains 5 / 10 / 15 points of Complex Time based on the number of orbs pinged.
- Gains 5 / 10 / 15 points of Veiled Edge based on the number of orbs pinged.

blue_orb.name: Shattered Spring Songs

result: - Deals a total of **{0}%** / **{1}%** / **{2}%** Physical DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.
- Gains 10 / 20 / 30 points of Complex Time based on the number of orbs pinged.
- Gains 5 / 10 / 50 points of Veiled Edge based on the number of orbs pinged.

skills.name: Fleeting Grace
description: While Way of the Strings is active, all Signal Orbs will be converted into White Signal Orbs. While Way of Strife is active, all Signal Orbs will be converted into Blue Signal Orbs. Hanying: Solacetune gains 30% DMG Reduction while she has a shield.

skills.name: Open String
description: Pinging 6 White Orbs in  Way of the Strings grants a  Harmonics Orb. When the  Harmonics Orb is present, Red and Yellow Orbs are temporarily hidden. Pinging the  Harmonics Orb activates  Moonsong Realm.  Moonsong Realm weakens enemies and strengthens allies inside its area of effect while active. Hanying: Solacetune will exit  Moonsong Realm upon leaving the battlefield or performing  Signature-Hymn of the Pale Moon.
result: - Gains Super Armor during the animation of activating Moonsong Realm and deals **{0}%** Physical DMG after inflicting 1 stack of the Mark of Evanescence on nearby enemies. Gains 20 Signature Energy and 55 points of Veiled Edge.

- Every second, Moonsong Realm inflicts enemies inside with Piercing Strike effect that reduces Physical Defense by 20% and the Penetrating Pivot effect that reduces Physical Resistance by 10% for 8s. Triggering these effects again refreshes their duration.
- Moonsong Realm imbues allies inside with the Mingling Moon and Lantern effect and grants them 1 stack of Song of Red Clouds every second.
- Mingling Moon and Lantern: Accumulation rate of Veiled Edge increases by 50% for 8s. Triggering it again will refresh its duration.
- Song of Red Clouds: Gains a shield equal to 5% of Hanying: Solacetune's Max HP for 3s; this effect can stack up to 4 times, and triggering it again will refresh its duration.

skills.name: Azure Allure
skills.button_press: Way of Strife + 30 Complex Time + Tap Signature Move
description:
Basic Attacks and Signal Orb skills grant  Complex Time. Maximum points of  Complex Time: 120. Tap Signature Move while in Way of Strife to consume 30 points of Complex Time to unleash Azure Allure and deal Physical DMG to the target. This skill can trigger Trueslash when it hits the target.

While performing this skill, Hanying: Solacetune gains Super Armor and can evade incoming attacks. When performed consecutively, the Base DMG of Azure Allure increases by 50% every cast. This effect can stack up to twice, and subsequent casts of Azure Allure will retain the maximum multiplier after the Base DMG increase effect reaches the maximum value.

Gain 5 Signature Energy upon performing this skill. When performed consecutively, the amount of Signature Energy granted by this skill doubles every cast. The maximum value of Signature Energy granted by a single cast of this skill is 40.
result: - Azure Allure deals **{0}%** Physical DMG; triggers Trueslash when this skill hits the target.
- Lavish Azure Allure: If performed with maximum points of Complex Time, trigger Phoenix Down once.

- Sonorous Azure Allure: Upon performing the fourth move of the Basic Attack sequence or a Blue 3-Ping, the Seal of Flow will briefly appear. Performing Azure Allure while the Seal of Flow is present causes a double to attack the target together, dealing **{1}%** Trueslash DMG.

skills.name: Phoenix Down
description: Performing Lavish Azure Allure inside Moonsong Realm triggers Phoenix Down. The realm reverberates, releasing sound waves that travel to the realm's edge and pulling in enemies in the area. Deals Trueslash DMG and inflicts 1 stack of the Mark of Evanescence on enemies; one enemy can be inflicted with up to 3 stacks of the Mark of Evanescence. At the same time, Hanying: Solacetune gains 1 stack of Relentless. Maximum number of Relentless stacks: 3. Hanying: Solacetune can enter Matrix by dodging with Phoenix Down.
result: - Deals **{0}%** Trueslash DMG.

skills.name: Sublimity
skills.button_press: Way of Strife + Mark of Evanescence + Tap Basic Attack
description: Performing Basic Attacks against a target that is inflicted with the  Mark of Evanescence triggers  Sublimity, during which Hanying: Solacetune gains Super Armor. When the attack hits the target, deals Trueslash DMG based on the number of the  Mark of Evanescence stacks and recovers Signal Orbs based on the number of  Relentless stacks by consuming all  Mark of Evanescence stacks on the target and  Relentless stacks on self.
result: - Sublimity deals **{0}%** Trueslash DMG and can trigger Trueslash when it hits the target.
- Increases the Base DMG of Sublimity by 0% / 150% / 300% based on the number of the Mark of Evanescence stacks consumed.
- Recovers 2 / 3 / 4 Signal Orbs based on the number of Relentless stacks consumed.

skills.name: Affix: Trueslash
description: Certain skills can accumulate Veiled Edge points. Veiled Edge points can be inherited by the next character with the Trueslash Effect. Maximum points of Veiled Edge: 999.
result: - When Veiled Edge points reach 100, perform Trueslash by consuming 100 Veiled Edge points upon hitting the enemy with the next cast of a skill that can trigger Trueslash, dealing 400% Trueslash DMG.
- Gains 1 point of Veracity every time Trueslash is triggered. Maximum points of Veracity: 90.

skills.name: Viridian Flutter
description: Pulls out the hairpin and enters Way of Strife, launching a blitz strike at the target to deal Physical DMG while activating Time Lag Calculation. If the target has the Mark of Evanescence, consume 1 stack of the Mark of Evanescence to make this cast of Viridian Flutter a guaranteed CRIT with the Base DMG increased by 100%.
result: - Deals **{0}%** Physical DMG.

skills.name: Hymn of the Pale Moon
skills.button_press: Way of Strife + Consume 100 Energy + Hold Signature Move
description: After a string of piercing strikes, unleashes a finishing blow to the target, gathering surrounding targets and dealing Physical DMG while activating Time Lag Calculation. Afterwards, exits Moonsong Realm.
result: - Deals **{0}%** Physical DMG.

qte.name: Hegemon's Fall
qte.description: Gathers the surrounding enemy units while dealing Physical DMG, inflicting the targets with the  Piercing Strike effect that reduces Physical Defense and the  Penetrating Pivot effect that reduces Physical Resistance.
result: - Deals a total of **{0}%** Physical DMG.
- Piercing Strike reduces the target's Physical Defense by 20% for 8s.
- Penetrating Pivot reduces the target's Physical Resistance by 10% for 8s.

leader.name: Jolted From a Dream
leader.description: Increases Physical DMG of all members by 10%. Increases DMG of Tank Omniframes by 5%.

class.name: Tank
class.description: Attacks reduce the target's Extra DMG Reduction by **{0}%** for 5s.

levels.desc: Upon unleashing  Signature-Viridian Flutter,  Signature-Hymn of the Pale Moon, activate all available QTEs.

Gains  15 Complex Time every time Hanying: Solacetune enters the battlefield. Upon pinging  Harmonics Orb, immediately gain 3 Signal Orbs. If lacking  Complex Time when continuously unleashing  Azure Allure, can consume 3 Signal Orbs to substitute for the consumption of  Complex Time.  Signature-Hymn of the Pale Moon Base DMG increases by  100%.  Piercing Strike effect applied by Hanying: Solacetune increases by  20%.

sss_rank.name: A Magpie, Perched on the Branch

levels.desc: Gains 3 Signal Orbs every time Hanying: Solacetune enters the battlefield. While in  Way of Strife, Extra DMG Bonus increases by  15%.  Mingling Moon and Lantern effect applied by Hanying: Solacetune increases by  50%;  Penetrating Pivot effect increases by  5%.

Base DMG amplifying effect from each consecutive cast of  Azure Allure increases to  100%. While in  Way of Strife, triggers a single cast of  Phoenix Down upon completely filling  Complex Time points inside  Moonsong Realm. Extra DMG of  Trueslash performed by Hanying: Solacetune increases by  100%.  Penetrating Pivot effect applied by Hanying: Solacetune increases by  10%. Reduces swap cooldown of all party members by  3s; this cannot be stacked with other swap cooldown-reducing effects.
Extra DMG Bonus of  Signature-Viridian Flutter, Signature-Hymn of the Pale Moon increases by  30%.
Extra DMG Bonus of  Phoenix Down, Harmonics Orb, and  Signal Orbs increase by  30%.
Extra DMG Bonus of  Azure Allure and  Sublimity increases by  30%.

basic_attack.name: Hawk's Flutter - Quick Draw
basic_attack.description: Uses the Revolver to perform consecutive attacks against the enemy and summons lightweight drones to aid in the battle.
result: - Deals a total of **{0}%** Ice DMG.

basic_attack.name: Hawk's Flutter - Bullet Hail
basic_attack.button_press: Calibration Mode + Cylinder is not empty + Hold Basic Attack
basic_attack.description: Activates Double-Action Mode, using the hidden Cylinder to continuously consume Condensation Rounds and fire at the enemy. Gains Super Armor and 50% DMG Reduction during this. Depending on the current Calibration Mode, deals Ice DMG or Hiemal DMG while gaining additional Signature Energy.
result: - If fired in Calibration Mode: Quiescence, each shot consumes 2 Condensation rounds, dealing **{0}%** Ice DMG.
- If fired in Calibration Mode: Desolation, each shot consumes 2 Condensation rounds, dealing **{1}%** Hiemal DMG and granting 100 Glaciation Points.
- Each shot additionally grants 5 / 9 / 13 / 17 / 21 / 40 Signature Energy based on the current number of shots fired. Exiting Double-Action Mode resets the counter.
- When Wanshi runs out of Condensation Rounds or exits Calibration Mode, he will exit Double-Action Mode after a short delay.
- If Wanshi has an Ancillary Revolver, holding Basic Attack will automatically trigger Frosty Ascent and reload the gun, then continue shooting.

red_orb.name: Hyperborean Current - Gale Strike
red_orb.description: Consumes 1 Condensation Round to fire at the enemy, dealing Ice or Hiemal DMG depending on the current Calibration Mode. When this skill is performed consecutively, Wanshi enters Burst Mode, during which he gains Super Armor, 50% DMG Reduction, Wounding buff, and additional Signature Energy.
result: - When fired in Calibration Mode: Quiescence, deals **{0}%** Ice DMG.
- When fired in Calibration Mode: Desolation, deals **{1}%** Hiemal DMG and grants 100 Glaciation Points.

- When performed consecutively, Wanshi enters Burst Mode, gaining the Wounding buff. The Wounding buff increases the Base DMG of the next Gale Strike cast by 7.5% for 3s. Triggering this effect again refreshes its duration. Maximum no. of Wounding stacks: 12. Exiting Burst Mode clears all Wounding stacks. Wanshi additionally gains 25% Base DMG Increase when he has the maximum no. of Wounding stacks.
- Exiting Calibration Mode automatically ends Burst Mode.
- When in Burst Mode, each shot additionally grants 2 / 6 / 10 / 14 / 18 / 37 Signature Energy based on the current number of shots fired. Exiting Burst Mode resets the counter.

red_orb.name: Hyperborean Current - Airdropped Revolver
red_orb.button_press: Ancillary Revolver + Calibration Mode + Empty Cylinder + Tap Red Orb
red_orb.description: Commands the lightweight drone to consume and toss out an Ancillary Revolver, pulling in enemies and dealing Ice DMG. Freezes the Calibration Meter while performing this skill. After catching the thrown revolver, Wanshi can replace his gun to reload the Cylinder and refresh the duration of Calibration Mode.
result: - Deals **{0}%** Ice DMG when throwing the Ancillary Revolver. Tapping Red Orb again or dodging will make Wanshi: Lucid Dreamer automatically rush to the Ancillary Revolver's landing point, during which he will be invincible. Upon successfully catching the thrown revolver, reload the Cylinder and refresh the duration of Calibration Mode.

red_orb.name: Hyperborean Current - Effulgent Shatter
red_orb.button_press: Ancillary Revolver + Calibration Mode + During Bullet Hail + Empty Cylinder + Tap Red Orb
red_orb.description: Expends the Ancillary Revolver to reload the Cylinder and consumes Condensation Rounds to trigger Frosty Ascent. Freezes the Calibration Meter and grants invincibility to Wanshi while performing this skill. Deals Ice or Hiemal DMG depending on the current Calibration Mode. Tapping Red Orb again or dodging during Frosty Ascent will make Wanshi command the lightweight drone to throw an Ancillary Revolver; this freezes the Calibration Meter, pulls in enemies, and deals Ice DMG. Upon successfully catching the thrown revolver, reload the Cylinder and refresh the duration of Calibration Mode.
result: - Frosty Ascent deals **{0}%** Ice DMG; deals **{1}%** Hiemal DMG instead and gains 400 Glaciation Points if in Calibration Mode: Desolation. Every 2 Condensation Rounds consumed while performing Frosty Ascent grants 13 Signature Energy.

- Wanshi can replace his gun during Frosty Ascent by tapping Red Orb again, dealing **{2}%** Ice DMG. Tapping Red Orb or dodging at that moment will make Wanshi: Lucid Dreamer automatically rush to the Ancillary Revolver's landing point, during which he will be invincible. Upon successfully catching the thrown revolver, reload the Cylinder and refresh the duration of Calibration Mode.

red_orb.name: Hyperborean Current - Swift Phantom
red_orb.button_press: Not in Calibration Mode + When dodging + Ping Red Orb

result: - Deals **{0}%** Ice DMG.
