result: - Deals **{0}%** / **{1}%** / **{2}%** Ice DMG, gains 20 / 40 / 80 Calibration Points, and accumulates 10 / 20 / 30 Glaciation Points based on the number of orbs pinged. Calibration Meter can be charged up to 80% using this method.
- Additionally, gains 8 Signature Energy upon a 3-Ping.

yellow_orb.name: Strix Dash - Pinion Volley
yellow_orb.description: Steps back before slamming forward, dealing Ice DMG, gaining Calibration Points, and accumulating Glaciation Points. Gains additional Signature Energy upon a 3-Ping.
result: - Deals **{0}%** / **{1}%** / **{2}%** Ice DMG, gains 20 / 40 / 80 Calibration Points, and accumulates 10 / 20 / 30 Glaciation Points based on the number of orbs pinged. Calibration Meter can be charged up to 80% using this method.
- Additionally, gains 8 Signature Energy upon a 3-Ping.

yellow_orb.name: Strix Dash - Rending Plume
yellow_orb.description: Depending on the timing of casting this skill, Wanshi will either perform a close-range shot or provide covering fire, dealing Ice DMG.
result: - Deals a total of **{0}%** / **{1}%** / **{2}%** Ice DMG based on the number of Yellow Orbs pinged.

- If Wanshi is attacked while performing a close-range shot, he will instead trigger covering fire, dealing **{3}%** Ice DMG and gaining 40 Calibration Points. If Calibration Meter is already full when the covering fire is triggered, Wanshi can immediately enter Calibration Mode: Quiescence.
- When this skill is performed in Calibration Mode, it will be considered as performing Gale Strike.

blue_orb.name: Skytearing Frost - Gelid Burst
blue_orb.description: Steps back and throws a tactical grenade that explodes after a short delay, dealing Ice DMG to enemies, gaining Calibration Points, and accumulating Glaciation Points. If Wanshi: Lucid Dreamer is within the area of the explosion, it will be considered as dealing DMG to himself. Gains additional Signature Energy upon a 3-Ping.
result: - Deals **{0}%** / **{1}%** / **{2}%** Ice DMG, gains 20 / 40 / 80 Calibration Points, and accumulates 10 / 20 / 30 Glaciation Points based on the number of orbs pinged. Calibration Meter can be charged up to 80% using this method.
- Additionally, gains 8 Signature Energy upon a 3-Ping.

blue_orb.name: Skytearing Frost - Suppressing Airstrike
blue_orb.description: Summons a lightweight drone to immediately detonate the grenade, dealing Ice DMG to enemies, gaining Calibration Points, and accumulating Glaciation Points. If Wanshi: Lucid Dreamer is within the area of the explosion, it will be considered as dealing DMG to himself. Gains additional Signature Energy upon a 3-Ping.
result: - Deals **{0}%** / **{1}%** / **{2}%** Ice DMG, gains 20 / 40 / 80 Calibration Points, and accumulates 10 / 20 / 30 Glaciation Points based on the number of orbs pinged. Calibration Meter can be charged up to 80% using this method.
- Additionally, gains 8 Signature Energy upon a 3-Ping.

blue_orb.name: Skytearing Frost - Targeted Explosion
blue_orb.description: Attacks the tactical grenade to immediately trigger an explosion, dealing Ice DMG to enemies. If Wanshi: Lucid Dreamer is within the area of the explosion, it will be considered as dealing DMG to himself.
result: - Deals **{0}%** / **{1}%** / **{2}%** Ice DMG based on the number of Blue Orbs pinged.

- If Wanshi is attacked while he is raising the gun during the Red Orb animation, he will instead trigger covering fire, dealing **{3}%** Ice DMG and gaining 40 Calibration Points. If Calibration Meter is already full when the covering fire is triggered, Wanshi can immediately enter Calibration Mode: Quiescence.
- When this skill is performed in Calibration Mode, it will be considered as performing Gale Strike.

skills.name: Silence in the Snow
skills.button_press: Hold Red Orb or Hold Dodge
description: Enters the charging state, continuously accumulating Calibration Points. During this, gains Super Armor and 90% DMG Reduction.
result: - When the current value of Calibration Points is less than 80, gains 20 Calibration Points every second; when the current value of Calibration Points is 80 or more but less than 160, gains 40 Calibration Points every second; when the current value of Calibration Points is 160 or more, gains 80 Calibration Points every second.
- Maximum number of Calibration Points: 200

- Releasing the button early during charging will automatically trigger dodge; Calibration Points will accumulate as normal during the dodge. Additionally, gains a Signal Orb if Wanshi successfully dodges an attack.

skills.name: Cryonic Explosion
skills.button_press: Calibration Meter full + Release Red Orb or Release Dodge
description: Depending on whether Red Orb or Dodge was held to begin charging, enter different Calibration Modes. This move pulls in and debuffs enemies, deals DMG, grants 3 Signature Energy and an  Ancillary Revolver, and triggers Matrix if available. Gains a shield when performing Gale Strike or Bullet Hail in Calibration Mode.
result: - Hold and release Red Orb to enter Calibration Mode: Quiescence, dealing **{0}%** Ice DMG.
- Hold and release Dodge to enter Calibration Mode: Desolation, dealing **{1}%** Hiemal DMG.
- Inflicts enemies with the **Frost Corrosion** effect that reduces Ice Resistance by 25% for 8s when entering Calibration Mode.

- While in Calibration Mode, Wanshi consumes 30 Calibration Points every second, and he will exit Calibration Mode when he fully depletes Calibration Points. Performing a 3-Ping in Calibration Mode grants 40 Calibration Points.
result2: - While in Calibration Mode, each cast of Gale Strike or Bullet Hail grants a shield equal to 5% of Wanshi's maximum HP. This shield can stack up to 6 times.
- If the Cylinder is empty when entering Calibration Mode, Wanshi will immediately gain 1 Condensation Round

skills.name: Flash Freezing
description: Every time Wanshi is switched in, automatically fully reloads the Cylinder.

skills.name: Shot Correction
description: Every time Wanshi consumes Condensation Rounds, gains Correcting Rounds and charges the CUB.
result: - When charging the CUB, every Condensation Round consumed is considered 1 Signal Orb pinged.
- Gains 1 Correcting Round for every Condensation Round consumed.
- Maximum number of Correcting Rounds: 30

skills.name: Hollow Fracture
description: Wanshi can debuff enemies when damaging them with Condensation Rounds.
result: - Inflicts enemies with the **Frost Corrosion** effect that reduces Ice Resistance by 25% for 8s when damaging them with Condensation Rounds.

skills.name: Affix: Glaciation
description:
Certain skills fill the Glaciation Gauge. When full, the Gauge will clear itself and unleash Diamond Dust, dealing Hiemal DMG and accumulating a Diamond Dust stack. Casting an eligible skill will consume all Diamond Dust stacks and create an Ice Spike that deals Hiemal DMG to its surroundings.

If the character deals Hiemal DMG while the Ice Spike is on-field, triggers Crystallization, dealing additional Hiemal DMG and generating Glaciation points.

When the Ice Spike's on-field duration expires, triggers Icebreak, dealing Hiemal DMG based on the current Glaciation points. The Glaciation Gauge, Diamond Dust stacks, Ice Spike, and Glaciation points will carry over between characters with the Glaciation Affix.
result: - When Glaciation points reaches 100, unleashes Diamond Dust that deals 100% Hiemal DMG and accumulates 1 Diamond Dust stack, up to 10 stacks.

- If there is at least 1 Diamond Dust stack, certain skills can clear all Diamond Dust stacks and create an Ice Spike on-field, dealing 180% Hiemal DMG. The Ice Spike's duration increases by 1s for every Diamond Dust stack consumed.

- While the Ice Spike exists, if the character deals Hiemal DMG, triggers Crystallization, dealing 100% Hiemal DMG to enemies in a large area and generating 100 Glaciation points. Can be triggered once every 0.25s.

- When the Ice Spike's duration expires, triggers Icebreak to deal 100% Hiemal DMG to enemies in a large area. Base DMG of Icebreak increases by 9% for every 100 Glaciation points. The maximum Glaciation points is 10000.

skills.name: Hyperlinked Flight
skills.button_press: Consume 160 Energy + Not during Bullet Hail/Frosty Ascent + Tap Signature Move
description: Summons a lightweight drone to generate a forcefield, pulling in enemies and firing a strengthened Condensation Round. Deals Ice or Hiemal DMG depending on the current Calibration Mode. Upon performing this skill, immediately gains 1 Signal Orb and rearranges Signal Orbs into 3-Pings. Time Lag Calculation is activated while performing this skill. If Wanshi has the Domain Overlimit effect when performing this skill, its duration is refreshed.
result: - When Wanshi is in Calibration Mode: Quiescence or has not entered Calibration Mode, deals **{0}%** Ice DMG. If Wanshi is in Calibration Mode: Quiescence when performing this skill, resets the Calibration Meter upon performing this skill and exits Calibration Mode: Quiescence.
- When Wanshi is in Calibration Mode: Desolation, deals **{1}%** Hiemal DMG instead; resets the Calibration Meter upon performing this skill and exits Calibration Mode: Desolation.
- Performing Hyperlinked Flight while in Burst Mode can grant the Wounding buff.
- Generates an Ice Spike upon performing this skill based on the number of Diamond Dust Stacks.

skills.name: Ruinous Blizzard
skills.button_press: Consume 160 Energy + During Bullet Hail/Frosty Ascent + Tap Signature Move
description: The lightweight drone propels Wanshi: Lucid Dreamer into the air, pulling in enemies and strafing the ground. Deals Ice DMG or Hiemal DMG depending on the current  Calibration Mode. Upon performing this skill, immediately gain 1 Signal Orb and rearrange Signal Orbs into 3-Pings.  Time Lag Calculation is activated while performing this skill. If Wanshi has the  Overlimit Domain effect when performing this skill, its duration is refreshed.
result: - When Wanshi is in Calibration Mode: Quiescence, immediately deals **{0}%** Ice DMG; resets the Calibration Meter upon performing this skill and exits Calibration Mode: Quiescence. After exiting the battlefield, Wanshi: Lucid Dreamer will additionally deal **{1}%** Ice DMG when performing Point-blank Shooting; this effect can be triggered only once every time he exits the battlefield.

- When Wanshi is in Calibration Mode: Desolation, deals **{2}%** Hiemal DMG instead; resets the Calibration Meter upon performing this skill and exits Calibration Mode: Desolation. After exiting the battlefield, Wanshi: Lucid Dreamer will additionally deal **{3}%** Hiemal DMG when performing Point-blank Shooting; this effect can be triggered only once every time he exits the battlefield.
result2: - Performing this skill consumes all Correcting Rounds. Each Correcting Round consumed increases the Base DMG of this cast of Ruinous Blizzard by 5%. If 30 Correcting Rounds have been consumed when performing this skill, additionally gains 100% Base DMG Increase and 1 Signal Orb.
- Generates an Ice Spike upon performing this skill based on the number of Diamond Dust Stacks.

skills.name: Icerealm Brand
description: Leaves behind the Frostbound Zone that deals Ice DMG and debuffs enemies upon performing Hyperlinked Flight or Ruinous Blizzard.
result: - The Frostbound Zone deals **{0}%** Ice DMG to enemies inside every second for 12s.

qte.name: Point-blank Shooting
qte.description: Rushes and strikes forward, firing at close range. Deals Ice DMG and debuffs enemies.
result: - Deals **{0}%** Ice DMG and inflicts enemies with the **Frost Corrosion** effect that reduces Ice Resistance by 25% for 8s.

leader.name: A Clear Heart Drowned in Illusions
leader.description: Increases Ice DMG of all members by 10%. Increases DMG of Tank Omniframes by 5%.

class.name: Tank
class.description: Attacks reduce the target's Extra DMG Reduction by **{0}%** for 5s.

levels.desc: When entering or refreshing Calibration Mode or performing Hyperlinked Flight/Ruinous Blizzard, activates all available QTEs.

The entry skill is considered a Blue 3-Ping. When entering the battlefield via switch-in, gains 1 Signal Orb. When entering Calibration Mode, gains 12 Signature Energy. While in Calibration Mode: Desolation, Glaciation Point accumulation rate of Gale Strike and Bullet Hail doubles. Base DMG of Gale Strike and Bullet Hail increases by 100%.

**Frost Corrosion** effect applied by Wanshi: Lucid Dreamer increases by 10%. Signal Orb recovery rate increases by 100% during Bullet Hail. Base DMG of  Cryonic Explosion increases by 200%. Base DMG of  Airdropped Revolver and  Effulgent Shatter increases by 100%.

**Frost Corrosion** effect applied by Wanshi: Lucid Dreamer increases by 10%. Base DMG of Diamond Dust performed by Wanshi: Lucid Dreamer increases by 30%. When performing Hyperlinked Flight or Ruinous Blizzard in  Calibration Mode, increases their Base Multiplier by 1.5 times. When Wanshi: Lucid Dreamer has the maximum number of Wounding stacks, Base DMG of  Hyperlinked Flight additionally increases by 60%. Reduces swap cooldown of all party members by  3s; this cannot be stacked with other swap cooldown-reducing effects.
Extra DMG Bonus of Gale Strike, Bullet Hail, and Frosty Ascent increases by 30%. Extra DMG Bonus of the DMG when generating an Ice Spike increases by 100%.
Extra DMG Bonus of Wanshi: Lucid Dreamer increases by 10% in Calibration Mode.
Extra DMG Bonus of Hyperlinked Flight and Ruinous Blizzard increases by 35%. Extra DMG Bonus of the DMG dealt by Diamond Dust increases by 30%.

basic_attack.name: Feather Storm - Searing Slash
basic_attack.description: Swings dual blades at the enemy to slash continuously, dealing Fire DMG. While in Levitating Mode, Basic Attacks deal Fire DMG and obtain Radiance Points. Tapping Basic Attack at a certain timing will trigger a special attack.
result: - Deals a total of **{0}%** Fire DMG.
- While in Levitating Mode, Basic Attacks deal a total of **{1}%** Fire DMG and each Basic Attack obtains 25 Radiance Points.

- Searing Slash - Shatter: Tapping Basic Attack at the precise timing after performing Basic Attack Combo 5, or tapping Basic Attack after dodging successfully will perform Searing Slash - Shatter, dealing **{2}%** Fire DMG and recovering 30 Radiance Points. During this, gains Super Armor. After performing this skill, using Basic Attack will start from Basic Attack Combo 4.

result: - Deals **{0}%** Fire DMG.

- Obtains 10 / 20 / 30 / 40 / 50 / 60 / 70 / 80 / 90 Radiance Points immediately based on the number of orbs pinged.

yellow_orb.name: Omnidirectional Glare - Soaring Strike

result: - Gains 20 / 40 / 60 Temper Points while performing the skill based on the number of orbs pinged.

yellow_orb.name: Omnidirectional Glare - Dual-wielding Arcflash
yellow_orb.button_press: After a Yellow 3-Ping + Tap Basic Attack repeatedly
yellow_orb.description: After a 3-Ping that performs the Yellow Orb skill, tap Basic Attack repeatedly to follow up with Lightspeed Rend - Dual-wielding Arcflash up to four times, dealing Fire DMG and gaining Radiance Points. During this, gains Super Armor.
result: - Gains 20 Radiance Points throughout the first three combos of Lightspeed Rend - Dual-wielding Arcflash.

- Gains 30 Radiance Points and 5 Signature Energy during the fourth combo of Lightspeed Rend - Dual-wielding Arcflash. After performing this skill, tapping Basic Attack at the precise timing will perform Searing Slash - Shatter.
- Deals a total of **{0}%** Fire DMG.

blue_orb.name: Roaring Firestorm - Solar Pierce

result: - Yata enters the battlefield in Empty Realm state. After obtaining 90 Flow Gauge, enter Instructed Realm and obtain a Profound Principle Orb. Gain Super Armor when casting Regulated Thunder Flow.

- After obtaining 60 Flow Gauge in Instructed Realm, enter Enlightened Realm and gain a Profound Principle Orb and a 10% ATK bonus. Afterwards, gain a Profound Principle Orb for every 30 Flow Gauge obtained.
- Obtaining a Profound Principle Orb when one is already held will enhance it.
- When Yata exits the battlefield, returns to Empty Realm and clears all Flow Gauge, Illuminated Guidance, and the Profound Principle Orb.

skills.name: Nocturne Rush
description:
Casting Upanishad - Slice will accumulate Illuminated Guidance, up to 2 stacks.
With at least 1 stack, hold Basic Attack to consume all Illuminated Guidance and cast Nocturne Rush, dealing damage based on the number of Illuminated Guidance stacks consumed.
result: - Nocturne Rush: Swing deals 240%/400% Lightning DMG, and will then transition into Nocturne Rush: Seize. If an Ice Spike exists on the field, deals 216%/360% Hiemal DMG instead.

Nocturne Rush: Seize deals 360%/600% Lightning DMG per second and restores 1 Signal Orb every 1.5s. Release Basic Attack to cast Nocturne Rush: Finisher. If an Ice Spike exists on the field, deals 288%/480% Hiemal DMG per second.

After 1 second of continuously casting Nocturne Rush: Seize, Yata will gain Glaciation Gauge over time and the gain rate will gradually increase. After 1s of sustained casting, gain 100 Glaciation points per second. After 2s of sustained casting, gain 200 Glaciation points per second. After 4s of sustained casting, gain 250 Glaciation points per second.
Nocturne Rush: Finisher deals 600%/1000% Lightning DMG. After this skill is cast, gain 10 Energy. If an Ice Spike exists on the field, deals 540%/900% Hiemal DMG instead.

skills.name: Affix: Glaciation
description: Certain skills fill the Glaciation Gauge. When full, the Gauge will clear itself and unleash Diamond Dust, dealing Hiemal DMG and accumulating a Diamond Dust stack. Casting an eligible skill will consume all Diamond Dust stacks and create an Ice Spike that deals Hiemal DMG to its surroundings. If the character deals Hiemal DMG while the Ice Spike is on-field, triggers Crystallization, dealing additional Hiemal DMG and generating Glaciation points. When the Ice Spike's on-field duration expires, triggers Icebreak, dealing Hiemal DMG based on the current Glaciation points. The Glaciation Gauge, Diamond Dust stacks, Ice Spike, and Glaciation points will carry over between characters with the Glaciation Affix.
result: - When Glaciation points reaches 100, unleashes Diamond Dust that deals 100% Hiemal DMG and accumulates 1 Diamond Dust stack, up to 10 stacks.

- If there is at least 1 Diamond Dust stack, certain skills can clear all Diamond Dust stacks and create an Ice Spike on-field, dealing 180% Hiemal DMG. The Ice Spike's duration increases by 1s for every Diamond Dust stack consumed.

- While the Ice Spike exists, if the character deals Hiemal DMG, triggers Crystallization, dealing 100% Hiemal DMG to enemies in a large area and generating 100 Glaciation points. Can be triggered once every 0.25s.

- When the Ice Spike's duration expires, triggers Icebreak to deal 100% Hiemal DMG to enemies in a large area. Base DMG of Icebreak increases by 9% for every 100 Glaciation points. The maximum Glaciation points is 10000.

levels.desc: Switching to the Shield Axe, casting **Starfall Collapse**, **Burning Breakaway**, **Heavenly Star Piercer** and **Gigabyte Star Sunder** trigger all available QTEs.

Upon exiting the battlefield, automatically uses QTE. After casting **Red Orb Combo 2** or **Blue Orb Combo 2**, tap Red Orb or Blue Orb again to immediately cast the respective Combo 2 skill. Base DMG of **Celestial Convene** and **Red Orb**/**Blue Orb Combo 2** increases by 60%. Base DMG of **lightstreams** increases by 100%. Base DMG of **Searing Buzzsaw** increases by 110%. If **Starfall Collapse** is cast and consumes 100 **Astra Gauge**, generates an additional 50 **Exceed Points** and increases the Base DMG of this **Starfall Collapse** by 50%. After switching to **Shield Axe** for the first time upon entering the battlefield, gain 15 Signature Energy.

Resistance Reduction effects of **Turbulence Interference** and **Scorching Invasion** increase by 10%. Base DMG of **Starfall Collapse** increases by 100%. Base DMG of **Burning Breakaway** increases by 60%. **Searing Buzzsaw**'s rate of applying Combustibility points increases by 100%.

Resistance Reduction effects of **Turbulence Interference** and **Scorching Invasion** increase by 10%. For every 75 **Exceed Points** consumed by **Starfall Collapse**, increases the Base DMG of the next **Gigabyte Star Sunder** by 25%; stacks are cleared upon dismantling the Shield Axe. For every 5 Combustible stacks applied to the target, increases the Base DMG of **Heavenly Star Piercer**: Burn by 16%. Upon entering the battlefield, the first **Big Bang Victory!** cast will generate 100 **Astra Gauge**, and the first 4th-hit **lightstream** will restore an extra 16 Signature Energy. Reduces the swap cooldown of all members in the team by 3s; this does not stack with other effects of the same type.
Extra DMG Bonus of **Starfall Collapse** increases by 20%. Extra DMG Bonus of **lightstreams** increases by 35%. Extra DMG Bonus of **Burning Breakaway** increases by 100%.
Extra DMG Bonus of **Celestial Convene** and Red Orb/**Blue Orb Combo 2** increases by 100%. Extra DMG Bonus of **Searing Buzzsaw** increases by 50%.
Extra DMG Bonus of **Heavenly Star Piercer** and **Gigabyte Star Sunder** increases by 40%.

result: - After casting, gain **10/20/30 Transience Gauge** and **15/30/45 Gravitational Collapse Points** based on the number of orbs pinged.
- Deals **{0}%/{1}%/{2}%** Nihil DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.

red_orb.name: Arcane Submergence - Tank State
red_orb.description:
**Fire**: Casting Red Orb - Arcane Submergence will apply the **Scorching Invasion** effect that reduces Fire Resistance by **15%** and **Collapse Singularity** effect that reduces Nihil Resistance by **15%** to targets hit for **8**s. The duration resets each time it is triggered.
**Ice**: Casting Red Orb - Arcane Submergence will apply the **Frost Corrosion** effect that reduces Ice Resistance by **15%** and **Collapse Singularity** effect that reduces Nihil Resistance by **15%** to targets hit for 8s. The duration resets each time it is triggered.
red_orb.description2:
**Lightning**: Casting Red Orb - Arcane Submergence will apply the **Turbulence Interference** effect that reduces Lightning Resistance by **15%** and **Collapse Singularity** effect that reduces Nihil Resistance by **15%** to targets hit for 8s. The duration resets each time it is triggered.
**Dark**: Casting Red Orb - Arcane Submergence will apply the **Chain Fusion** effect that reduces Dark Resistance by **15%** and **Collapse Singularity** effect that reduces Nihil Resistance by **15%** to targets hit for 8s. The duration resets each time it is triggered.

red_orb.name: Arcane Submergence - Amplifier State
red_orb.description:
**Fire**: Casting Red Orb - Arcane Submergence will heal allies for 40% of ATK, grant the **Fire Tempered** effect that increases Fire DMG by **10%** and the **Disintegration** effect that increases Nihil DMG by **10%** to allies for **8s**. The duration resets each time it is triggered.
**Ice**: Casting Red Orb - Arcane Submergence will heal allies for 40% of ATK, grant the **Frost Crystal** effect that increases Ice DMG by **10%** and the **Disintegration** effect that increases Nihil DMG by **10%** to allies for **8s**. The duration resets each time it is triggered.
red_orb.description2:
**Lightning**: Casting Red Orb - Arcane Submergence will heal allies for 40% of ATK, grant the **Lightning Surge** effect that increases Lightning DMG by **10%** and the **Disintegration** effect that increases Nihil DMG by **10%** to allies for **8s**. The duration resets each time it is triggered.
**Dark**: Casting Red Orb - Arcane Submergence will heal allies for 40% of ATK, grant the **Dark Radiation** effect that increases Dark DMG by **10%** and the **Disintegration** effect that increases Nihil DMG by **10%** to allies for **8s**. The duration resets each time it is triggered.

result: - After casting, gain **15/30/45 Gravitational Collapse Points** based on the number of orbs pinged.

result: - If there is only one elemental Tank in the team, Ishmael: Parhelion will become an Amplifier of the corresponding element.
- If there is only one elemental Support/Amplifier in the team, Ishmael: Parhelion will become a Tank of the corresponding element.

skills.name: Parhelion's Halo
description: When Ishmael: Parhelion is in **Wanderer Form**, all Signal Orbs are converted into Blue Orbs. In **Eminence Form**, all Signal Orbs are converted into Red Orbs.

skills.name: Phantom of Mirage
description:
Dodging will release a projection that deals Nihil DMG. Tapping Dodge continuously will cast **Phantom Mysterium**. In **Eminence Form**, **30 Transience Gauge** can be consumed to cast **Phantom Abysm**, dealing Nihil DMG. **Phantom Abysm** deals more damage, restores **Signature Energy**, and does not consume Dodge Gauge.
After casting the 5th hit of **Phantom Abysm**, gain a **Mark of Collapse**.
result: - The projection released from dodging deals **{0}%** Nihil DMG.
- **Transience Gauge** has a maximum of **150**.

- Casting **Phantom Abysm** in **Eminence Form** gathers nearby enemies, deals **{5}%/{6}%/{7}%/{8}%/{9}%** Nihil DMG, and restores **12 Signature Energy**.

levels.desc: Casting **Signature - Primordial True Form/Signature - Extinction Sentence**, and **Dimensional Collapse** will activate all available QTEs.

Base DMG of **Signature - Extinction Sentence** increases by **60%**. While the **Incorporeal Inhibition Domain** is active, every **Phantom Abysm** generates an extra **3** Signature Energy. Enhances the special abilities triggered based on the **Observation Chronicle**.

**Gravitational Collapse Points**' damage amplification effect increases by **50%**. During the 5th hit of **Phantom Abysm**, you can input one 3-Ping to deal an additional **1000%** Nihil DMG and gain **180 Gravitational Collapse Points**. Enhances the special abilities triggered based on the **Observation Chronicle**. Base DMG efficiency increase against **Equilibrium Fields** increases to **150%**.

basic_attack.description: Taunts the enemy and attacks with **Startling Daylight** to deal Electroconvergence DMG and gain a **Trickery Mark**, then continuously consumes Yellow Orbs to cast **Bewildering Pivot**, dealing Electroconvergence DMG, gaining Electric Charge Points, Signature Energy, and increasing the **Card Rank**. Gain Super Armor and DMG Reduction during this period, and triggers Matrix if not on cooldown.
result: - **Startling Daylight** deals **{0}%** Electroconvergence DMG and heals Lilith for **{1}%** of ATK. Gain a **Trickery Mark**, 160 Electric Charge points, 10 Signature Energy, and Super Armor and 60% DMG reduction during the casting period.

- Every Orb consumed unleashes one instance of **Bewildering Pivot**, dealing **{2}%** Electroconvergence DMG. Gain 10 Signature Energy, 120 Electric Charge points, and Super Armor and 60% DMG Reduction during the casting period.
result2: - When Basic Attack is released or Yellow Orbs are depleted, casts **Silence's Return**, dealing **{0}%** Electroconvergence DMG. Lilith is invincible during this period but temporarily unable to cast **Invitation to Wildest Riches**. If **Bewildering Pivot** is successively cast 6 times, **Silencing Finish** will be automatically cast immediately and deal **{1}%** Electroconvergence DMG. Gain an extra 60 Signature Energy and 120 Electric Charge points, and increases **Card Rank** by 2.
- For every 3 Signal Orbs pinged during **Twilight's Embrace**, increases **Card Rank** by 1 after casting **Silencing Finish**.
- The **Trickery Mark** lasts for 15s. The duration is refreshed upon exiting the battlefield.

yellow_orb.name: Cunning Trick - Spindle

result: - Deals **{0}%/{1}%/{2}%** Dark DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.

yellow_orb.name: Cunning Trick - Shattered Facade

result: - Deals **{0}%/{1}%/{2}%** Dark DMG and gains 1/2/3 Yellow Orbs based on the number of orbs pinged, adding them to the upper Signal Orb lineup.

- After a Yellow 3-Ping, the next **Delusive Mirage** will increase Card Rank by 1.

- After casting **Spindle**/**Flourish**/**Shattered Facade**, obtain **Red Orb - Vanishing Act/Red Orb - Steady Focus/Red Orb - Mindbreak**. Only 1 Red Orb can be stored at a time. When another Red Orb is obtained, casts a skill based on the last Yellow Orb, and refreshes the Red Orb type. If **Red Orb - Mindbreak** is held, it will not be refreshed until pinged.

Afterwards, leaves behind an **After-Party Field** that restores HP to allies within and converts unused Yellow/Red Orbs to an equal number of Blue Orbs.

qte.description: Deals damage and heals.
result: - Deals **{0}%** Dark DMG in total.
- If Lilith has a **Trickery Mark**, deals **{1}%** Electroconvergence DMG instead.
- Heals for **{2}%** of ATK.

leader.name: House of Cards
leader.description: All members' ATK increases by 10%. Amplifiers' Dark DMG Bonus and Electroconvergence DMG Bonus increases by 5%.

class.name: Amplifier
class.description: All switched-in members gain an extra **{0}%** ATK and **{1}%** Elemental DMG Bonus of the Amplifier's element for 10s. If Lilith: Daemonissa has a **Trickery Mark**, her Element is regarded as Lightning.

levels.desc: Casting **Twilight's Embrace**, **Delusive Mirage**, and **Disenchanting Reveal** will activate all available QTEs.

When **Cunning Trick** consumes a cumulative total of 1-3/4-9 Signal Orbs, Base DMG of **Delusive Mirage** increases by 20%/3%, up to 78%. Effect resets after casing **Delusive Mirage** or **Disenchanting Reveal**. For every 1 Yellow Orb consumed by **Twilight's Embrace**, Base DMG of **Twilight's Embrace - Silencing Finish** increases by 20%.

Increases the **Dark Radiation** effect granted to allies healed by Lilith by 10%. If Lilith has a **Trickery Mark**, increases the **Lightning Surge** effect granted to allies healed by 10%. Base DMG of **Cunning Trick** increases by 120%. Base DMG of **Twilight's Embrace - Startling Daylight** and **Twilight's Embrace - Bewildering Pivot** increases by 80%.

All member switch-ins reset the cooldown of QTE skills. Increases the **Dark Radiation** effect granted to allies healed by Lilith by 10%. If Lilith has a **Trickery Mark**, increases the **Lightning Surge** effect granted to allies healed by 10%. Casting **Disenchanting Reveal** deals an additional 190% Dark DMG 4 times, or 70% Ionization DMG if there is a **Trickery Mark**; when **Card Rank** is at **C/B/A/S/SS**, adds an extra 3/4/5/6/8 instances of damage.
Extra DMG Bonus of **Delusive Mirage** and **Twilight's Embrace - Silencing Finish** increase by 50%.
Extra DMG Bonus of **Cunning Trick**, **Twilight's Embrace - Startling Daylight** and **Twilight's Embrace - Bewildering Pivot** increase by 50%.
Extra DMG Bonus of **Invitation to Wildest Riches** increases by 45%.

basic_attack.name: Legato Reprise: Progression
basic_attack.description: Unleashes a string of attacks with her sword while dancing, dealing Physical DMG.
result: - Basic Attacks deal a total of **{0}%** Physical DMG and grant a total of **50 Glaciation Points**.
- On the 5th hit, gains invincibility, 1 additional Signal Orb and 1 **Quaver**.

basic_attack.name: Legato Reprise: Inversion
basic_attack.description: Plays music to attack the target, dealing Physical DMG.
result: - Basic Attacks deal a total of **{0}%** Physical DMG and grant a total of **40 Glaciation Points**.

basic_attack.name: Legato Reprise: Bladed Resonance
basic_attack.description: After holding Basic Attack, Selena switches back to the sword and briefly charges before rushing through the enemy, dealing Physical DMG and gaining **Signature Energy**. During any Signal Orb skill, hold Basic Attack to cast this skill immediately.
result: - Deals **{0}%** Physical DMG. After casting, gains **12 Signature Energy**.
- While an Ice Spike is active, deals **{1}%** Glaciation DMG instead.

- If Basic Attack is held, Selena will continuously consume **Quavers** to increase its Base DMG by **{2}%/{3}%/{4}%**. Selena can block incoming attacks while charging. Upon a successful block, all **Quavers** are consumed immediately. After casting, triggers Matrix if it is not on cooldown.

basic_attack.name: Legato Reprise: Transposed Divisi
basic_attack.button_press: Swordbearer + Have 1 Quaver + Tap Dodge during any action
basic_attack.description: Tap Dodge during any action as a **Swordbearer** to quickly cast this skill, consuming 1 **Quaver** to rapidly thrust forward and deal Physical DMG. If there are sufficient **Quavers**, tap Dodge to cast it again. Afterwards, tap Basic Attack to cast the 5th hit of **Basic Attack - Progression**.
result: - Gains Super Armor and can dodge incoming attacks during this skill. A successful Dodge triggers Matrix if it is not on cooldown.
- Deals **{0}%** Physical DMG. After casting, gains 5 Signature Energy.

red_orb.name: Ardent Chord: Legato
red_orb.description: Lunges forward and stabs the target, dealing Physical DMG.
result: - Gains 1 **Quaver** upon a 3-Ping, storing up to 3 **Quavers**.
- Deals **{0}%/{1}%/{2}%** Physical DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.

red_orb.name: Ardent Chord: Overtone
red_orb.description: Unleashes a flurry of stabbing attacks at the target, dealing Physical DMG.
result: - Gains 1 **Quaver** upon a 3-Ping, storing up to 3 **Quavers**.
- Deals **{0}%/{1}%/{2}%** Physical DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.

yellow_orb.name: Thunderous Modulation: Slicing Bowstring
yellow_orb.description: Twirls and slashes the target, dealing Physical DMG.
result: - Gains 1 **Quaver** upon a 3-Ping, storing up to 3 **Quavers**.
- Deals **{0}%/{1}%/{2}%** Physical DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.

yellow_orb.name: Thunderous Modulation: Staccato
yellow_orb.button_press: During Slicing Bowstring + Tap Yellow Orb
yellow_orb.description: Sends an Iris at the target, dealing Physical DMG.
result: - Gains 1 **Quaver** upon a 3-Ping, storing up to 3 **Quavers**.
- Deals **{0}%/{1}%/{2}%** Physical DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.

blue_orb.name: Piercing Cadence
blue_orb.description: Selena's Blue Orb is permanently located in the rightmost orb position, and can only be cast after entering **Solo**. Selena rushes back and forth through the enemy, dealing Physical DMG. After casting, gains **Signature Energy**, and additional **Variation Points** if in **Transcendence**.
result: - Upon casting, deals **{0}%** Physical DMG and grants **12 Signature Energy**.
- If cast when in **Transcendence**, grants an additional **30 Variation Points**.
- While an Ice Spike is active, deals **{1}%** Glaciation DMG instead.
- Selena is invincible but unable to cast Signature Move.
- This skill does not consume the Blue Orb.

skills.name: Soloist's Stage
description: Selena attacks as a **Swordbearer** by default, and attacks as an **Instrumentalist** in **Transcendence**. Selena is unable to enter Matrix by Dodging, and can only trigger it through **Basic Attack - Bladed Resonance/Basic Attack - Transposed Divisi**. When Selena triggers Matrix by herself, she enters **Solo**.

skills.name: Concerto Orb
description: In **Transcendence**, 6 Signal Orbs will be converted into **Concerto Orbs**. Only **Concerto Orbs** can be obtained and pinged during **Transcendence**. After casting, deals Physical DMG and grants **Quavers**, **Variation Points**, **Temperament**, and **Signature Energy**. When **Transcendence** ends, the other Signal Orbs will be returned.
result: - Deals **{0}%** Physical DMG.
- For every **Concerto Orbs** pinged, gains 1 **Quaver**.
- While an **Ice Spike** is active, deals **{1}%** Glaciation DMG instead.
- After casting, gains **5 Variation Points**, **10 Temperament**, and **5 Signature Energy**.

skills.name: Fullbloom Tuning
description: When Selena is **Transcendence**, ping **Concerto Orbs** to gain **Temperament**, accumulating up to **60 points**. Casting this skill consumes **60 Temperament** to summon phantoms to attack, dealing Physical DMG and granting **Variation Points** and **Signature Energy**.
result: - Deals **{0}%** Physical DMG.
- While an **Ice Spike** is active, deals **{1}%** Glaciation DMG instead.
- Selena is invincible but unable to cast Signature Move. After casting, gains 30 **Variation Points** and 60 Signature Energy.

skills.name: Finale's Prelude
description: While Selena is in **Transcendence**, certain skills grant **Variation Points**, accumulating up to **100 points**. When **Variation Points** reach maximum, Selena enters **Finale's Prelude** and immediately gains **90 Signature Energy**.
result: - Entering **Finale's Prelude** immediately clears all **Quavers**.
- **Finale's Prelude** lasts for 7s. Selena switches to attacking as a **Swordbearer** and automatically casts **Signature - Howling Tempest** when it ends.
- Signal Orbs are infinite during **Finale's Prelude**.
- After **Finale's Prelude** ends, all **Quavers** are cleared.

skills.name: Affix: Glaciation
description:
Certain skills fill the **Glaciation Gauge**. When full, the Gauge will clear itself and unleash **Diamond Dust**, dealing Hiemal DMG and accumulating a **Diamond Dust stack**. Casting an eligible skill will consume all **Diamond Dust stacks** and create an **Ice Spike** that deals Hiemal DMG to its surroundings.

If the character deals Hiemal DMG while the **Ice Spike** is on-field, triggers **Crystallization**, dealing additional Hiemal DMG and generating **Glaciation** points.

When the Ice Spike's on-field duration expires, triggers **Icebreak**, dealing Hiemal DMG based on the current **Glaciation points**. The **Glaciation Gauge**, **Diamond Dust stacks**, **Ice Spike**, and **Glaciation points** will carry over between characters with the Glaciation Affix.
result: - When **Glaciation points** reaches **100**, unleashes **Diamond Dust** that deals 100% Hiemal DMG and accumulates **1 Diamond Dust stack**, up to **10** stacks.

- If there is at least 1 **Diamond Dust stack**, certain skills can clear all **Diamond Dust stacks** and create an **Ice Spike** on-field, dealing **180%** Hiemal DMG. The **Ice Spike**'s duration increases by 1s for every Diamond Dust stack consumed.

- While the **Ice Spike** exists, if the character deals Hiemal DMG, triggers **Crystallization**, dealing **100%** Hiemal DMG to enemies in a large area and generating **100 Glaciation points**. Can be triggered once every **0.25**s.

- When the **Ice Spike**'s duration expires, triggers **Icebreak** to deal **100%** Hiemal DMG to enemies in a large area. Base DMG of **Icebreak** increases by **9%** for every **100 Glaciation points**. The maximum **Glaciation points** is **10000**.

skills.name: Rainfall Overture
description: Selena prepares to perform and enters **Transcendence**, dealing Physical DMG. **Time Lag Calculation** is triggered during this skill. Immediately refreshes Matrix cooldown after casting. During **Transcendence**, gains Super Armor and accumulates **Variation Points** over time.
result: - Deals **{0}%** Physical DMG
- If there are 10 **Diamond Dust Stacks**, holding this skill will generate an **Ice Spike**.
- Gains 3 **Variation Points** per second.

skills.name: Howling Tempest
description: Selena conducts a magnificent performance, dealing Physical DMG and exiting **Transcendence**. **Time Lag Calculation** is triggered during this skill.
result: - Deals **{0}%** Physical DMG
- While an **Ice Spike** is active, deals **{1}%** Glaciation DMG instead. After casting, the **Ice Spike**'s duration expires and triggers **Icebreak**.
- After casting, **Temperament** and **Variation Points** are cleared, and 1 stack of **Dissonance** is removed.

skills.name: Forlorn Flower's Final Rest
description: Selena performs a curtain call finale, dealing Physical DMG and exiting **Finale's Prelude**. **Time Lag Calculation** is triggered during this skill. After casting, gains 2 stacks of **Dissonance**. While Selena still has **Dissonance**, she cannot cast **Signature - Forlorn Flower's Final Rest** and will cast **Signature - Howling Tempest** instead. Every entry to the battlefield or casting **Signature - Howling Tempest** removes a stack of **Dissonance**.
result: - Deals **{0}%** Physical DMG
- While an **Ice Spike** is active, deals **{1}%** Glaciation DMG instead. After casting, the **Ice Spike**'s duration expires and triggers **Icebreak**.
- After casting, all **Temperament** and **Variation Points** are cleared. Gain 3 Signal Orbs.

qte.name: Symphonic Splendor
qte.description: Selena attacks the target with a twirling dance, dealing Physical DMG.
result: - Deals **{0}%** Physical DMG.

leader.name: Rimeflower Director
leader.description: Increases Physical DMG and Glaciation DMG of all members by **10%**. Increases DMG of all Attacker Omniframes by **5%**.

class.name: Attacker
class.description: Extra DMG Bonus increases by **{0}%**.

levels.desc: Casting **Basic Attack - Bladed Resonance**, **Fullbloom Tuning**, **Signature - Howling Tempest/Signature - Forlorn Flower's Final Rest** will activate all available QTEs. Upon entering the battlefield, triggers all available QTEs.

Upon casting **Signature - Rainfall Overture**, immediately gains **60 Temperament**. After casting **Fullbloom Tuning**, every **Concerto Orb** pinged deals double damage until exiting **Transcendence**. Base DMG of **Signature - Howling Tempest/Signature - Forlorn Flower's Final Rest** increases by **30%**. After casting **Signature - Howling Tempest/Signature - Forlorn Flower's Final Rest** and exiting the battlefield, Selena enters **Lingering Echo** state, unleashing an attack that deals 2000% Physical DMG every 2s, then exits **Lingering Echo** state after 4 attacks.

When **Temperament is at 60**, **Concerto Orbs** grant twice the amount of **Variation Points**. Every 1 **Quaver** consumed increases the Base DMG of the next **Fullbloom Tuning** by **20%**, up to **100%**. After casting **Signature - Howling Tempest/Signature - Forlorn Flower's Final Rest**, Base DMG of QTE increases by 500% for the rest of the battle.

Upon entering the battlefield, immediately gains 1 **Quaver**, **12 Signature Energy**, and 1 Signal Orb. Increase the maximum amount of **Quavers** to **5**. After an orb skill, the next **Basic Attack - Bladed Resonance** will consume up to 6 Signal Orbs and convert them into **Quavers**. When Selena has **4/5 Quavers**, DMG Amplification for **Basic Attack - Bladed Resonance** increases to **300%/600%**. Selena's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 100% during **Lingering Echo** state.
Extra DMG Bonus of **Signature - Howling Tempest/Signature - Forlorn Flower's Final Rest** increases by **60%**.
Extra DMG Bonus of **Basic Attack - Bladed Resonance** and **Fullbloom Tuning** increases by **30%**.
Extra DMG Bonus of **Piercing Cadence**, **Concerto Orbs**, and Signal Orbs increases by **40%**.
